trans-unit.source: Description: Determines the method of flushing dirty blocks from the InnoDB buffer pool. If set to native or 0, the original InnoDB method is used. The maximum checkpoint age is determined by the total length of all transaction log files. When the checkpoint age reaches the maximum checkpoint age, blocks are flushed. This can cause lag if there are many updates per second and many blocks with an almost identical age need to be flushed. If set to estimate or 1, the default, the oldest modified age will be compared with the maximum age capacity. If it's more than 1/4 of this age, blocks are flushed every second. The number of blocks flushed is determined by the number of modified blocks, the LSN progress speed and the average age of all modified blocks. It's therefore independent of the innodb_io_capacity for the 1-second loop, but not entirely so for the 10-second loop. If set to keep_average or 2, designed specifically for SSD cards, a shorter loop cycle is used in an attempt to keep the I/O rate constant. Removed in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 and replaced with InnoDB flushing method from MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定从InnoDB 缓冲池中清除脏块的方法。如果设置为 native 或 0 ，则使用原始的InnoDB方法。最大检查点寿命取决于所有事务日志文件的总长度。当检查点使用期限达到最大检查点使用期限时，将刷新块。如果每秒有许多更新，并且需要刷新许多具有几乎相同寿命的块，则可能会导致延迟。如果设置为 estimate 或 1 ，默认情况下，最旧的修改年龄将与最大年龄容量进行比较。如果超过该年龄的1/4，则每秒刷新一次块。刷新的块数取决于修改后的块数，LSN进程速度和所有修改后的块的平均寿命。因此，对于1秒循环，它独立于innodb_io_capacity，但对于10秒循环，则不完全独立。如果设置为 keep_average 或 2 （专门为SSD卡设计），则将使用较短的循环周期来尝试保持I / O速率恒定。从MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，并由MySQL 5.6中的InnoDB刷新方法代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines the mode used for replication error checking and conflict resolution. STRICT mode is the default, and catches all all errors and conflicts. IDEMPOTENT mode suppresses duplicate key or no key errors, which can be useful in certain replication scenarios, such as when there are multiple masters, or circular replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定用于复制错误检查和冲突解决的模式。STRICT模式是默认模式，可捕获所有错误和冲突。IDEMPOTENT模式可抑制重复键或没有键错误，这在某些复制方案中很有用，例如当有多个主服务器或循环复制时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines the number of replication events that are grouped together. Experimental implementation aimed to assist with bottlenecks when a single slave faces a large commit time delay. If set to 0 (the default), there is no grouping.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定分组在一起的复制事件的数量。实验实现旨在在单个从站面临较大的提交时间延迟时帮助解决瓶颈问题。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则没有分组。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines the priority of the background Sweeper thread. Possible values are '0' (Low), '1' (Normal), or '2' (High). The Sweeper is responsible for removing deleted records and index entries (deleted records also result from UPDATE statements). If many old deleted records accumulate search operations become slower. Therefore it may improve performance to increase the priority of the Sweeper on a machine with 4 or more cores.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定后台清除程序线程的优先级。可能的值为“ 0 ”（低），“ 1 ”（正常）或“ 2 ”（高）。清除程序负责删除已删除的记录和索引条目（删除的记录也来自UPDATE语句）。如果许多旧的已删除记录积累起来，搜索操作就会变慢。因此，在具有4个或更多内核的计算机上，可以提高性能以增加Sweeper的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines the type conversion mode on the slave when using row-basedreplication, including replications in MariaDB Galera cluster. Multiple options can be set, delimited by commas. If left empty, the default, type conversions are disallowed. The variable is dynamic and a change in its value takes effect immediately. This variable tells the server what to do if the table definition is different between the master and slave (for example a column is 'int' on the master and 'bigint' on the slave).
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用基于行的复制（包括MariaDB Galera集群中的复制）时，确定从属服务器上的类型转换模式。可以设置多个选项，以逗号分隔。如果保留为空，则默认为类型转换。该变量是动态的，其值的更改会立即生效。此变量告诉服务器，如果主服务器和从服务器之间的表定义不同（例如，主服务器上的列为“ int”而从服务器上的列为“ bigint”），该怎么办。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether InnoDB mutexes are timed. OFF, the default, disables mutex timing, while ON enables it. See also SHOW ENGINE for more on mutex statistics. Deprecated in MariaDB 5.5.39, as has no effect anymore.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定InnoDB互斥锁是否计时。默认情况下， OFF 禁用互斥锁计时，而 ON 启用它。另请参见SHOW ENGINE，以获取有关互斥量统计信息的更多信息。在MariaDB 5.5.39中已弃用，不再具有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether replication is row-based, statement-based or mixed. Statement-based was the default until MariaDB 10.2.3. Be careful of changing the binary log format when a replication environment is already running. See Binary Log Formats. Starting from MariaDB 10.0.22 a slave will apply any events it gets from the master, regardless of the binary log format. binlog_format only applies to normal (not replicated) updates.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定复制是基于行，基于语句还是混合的。在MariaDB 10.2.3之前，默认情况是基于语句的。当复制环境已在运行时，请小心更改二进制日志格式。请参阅二进制日志格式。从MariaDB 10.0.22开始，无论二进制日志格式如何，从站都将应用从主站获取的所有事件。 binlog_format 仅适用于常规（非复制）更新。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether a user can set the variable innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit. If set to 1, a user cannot reset the value with a SET command, while if set to 1, a user can reset the value of innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定用户是否可以设置变量innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit。如果设置为 1 ，则用户无法使用SET命令重置该值；而如果设置为 1 ，则用户可以重置 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit 的值。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether flushing a page from the buffer pool will flush other dirty pages in the same group of pages (extent). In high write environments, if flushing is not aggressive enough, it can fall behind resulting in higher memory usage, or if flushing is too aggressive, cause excess I/O activity. SSD devices, with low seek times, would be less likely to require dirty neighbor flushing to be set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定从缓冲池刷新页面是否将刷新同一组页面中的其他脏页面（范围）。在高写入环境中，如果刷新不够积极，它将落后于后面，从而导致更高的内存使用率，或者如果刷新过于激进，则会导致过多的I / O活动。寻道时间短的SSD设备不太可能需要设置脏邻居刷新。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether index and data should use page checksums for extra safety. Can be overridden per table with PAGE_CHECKSUM clause in CREATE TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定索引和数据是否应使用页面校验和以提高安全性。可以使用CREATE TABLE中的 PAGE_CHECKSUM子句覆盖每个表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether view updates can be made with an UPDATE or DELETE statement with a LIMIT clause if the view does not contain all primary or not null unique key columns from the underlying table. 0 prohibits this, while 1 permits it while issuing a warning (the default).
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定如果视图不包含基础表中的所有主唯一键列或非null唯一键列，则是否可以使用带有LIMIT子句的UPDATE或DELETE语句进行视图更新。 0 禁止这样做，而 1 允许在发出警告时允许它（默认）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether, when dirty pages are flushed to the data file, neighboring pages in the data file are flushed at the same time. If set to none, the feature is disabled. If set to area, the default, the standard InnoDB behavior is used. For each page to be flushed, dirty neighboring pages are flushed too. If there's little head seek delay, such as SSD or large enough write buffer, one of the other two options may be more efficient. If set to cont, for each page to be flushed, neighboring contiguous blocks are flushed at the same time. Being contiguous, a sequential I/O is used, unlike the random I/O used in area. Replaced by innodb_flush_neighbors in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定在将脏页刷新到数据文件时，是否同时刷新数据文件中的相邻页。如果设置为 none ，则该功能被禁用。如果设置为 area ，则默认为标准的InnoDB行为。对于要刷新的每一页，也将刷新脏的相邻页面。如果头搜索延迟很小，例如SSD或足够大的写缓冲区，则其他两个选项之一可能会更有效。如果设置为 cont ，则对于要刷新的每个页面，将同时刷新相邻的连续块。由于是连续的，因此使用连续的I / O，这与 area 中使用的随机I / O不同。在MariaDB 10.0中由innodb_flush_neighbors代替/ XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines which additional warnings are logged. Setting to 0 disables additional warning logging. Note that this does not prevent all warnings, there is a core set of warnings that will always be written to the error log. The additional warnings are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定记录了哪些其他警告。设置为 0 将禁用其他警告日志记录。请注意，这并不能阻止所有警告，而是有一组核心警告将始终写入错误日志。其他警告如下：

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines, whether the connection between plugin and eperi Gateway is tested at server startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定在服务器启动时是否已测试插件和eperi Gateway之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines, whether the plugin should register callback functions for OpenSSL thread support.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定插件是否应该注册用于OpenSSL线程支持的回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Diagnostic variable intended only to be set at runtime. It specifies the qualified name (for example test/ft_innodb) of an InnoDB table that has a FULLTEXT index, and after being set the INFORMATION_SCHEMA tables INNODB_FT_INDEX_TABLE, INNODB_FT_INDEX_CACHE, INNODB_FT_CONFIG, INNODB_FT_DELETED, and INNODB_FT_BEING_DELETED will contain search index information for the specified table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅在运行时设置的诊断变量。它指定具有FULLTEXT索引的InnoDB表的限定名称（例如 test/ft_innodb ），并在设置INFORMATION_SCHEMA表INNODB_FT_INDEX_TABLE，INNODB_FT_INDEX_CACHE，INNODB_FT_CONFIG，INNODB_FT_DELETED以及指定的INNODB_FT_BEING_DELETED表信息之后将其包含在内。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory for storing temporary tables and files. Can specify a list (separated by semicolons in Windows, and colons in Unix that will then be used in round-robin fashion. This can be used for load balancing across several disks. Note that if the server is a replication slave, and slave_load_tmpdir, which overrides tmpdir for slave replication, is not set, you should not set tmpdir to a directory that is cleared when the machine restarts, or else replication may fail.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于存储临时表和文件的目录。可以指定列表（在Windows分号和冒号在Unix中，将随后在循环赛的方式使用分离。这可以跨多个磁盘可用于负载均衡。请注意，如果服务器是复制奴隶，slave_load_tmpdir，未设置为从属复制覆盖tmpdir的目录，您不应将tmpdir设置为在计算机重新启动时清除的目录，否则复制可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory for temporary files during DDL operations.
trans-unit.target: 描述： DDL操作期间临时文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory path for all InnoDB data files in the shared tablespace (assuming innodb_file_per_table is not enabled). File-specific information can be added in innodb_data_file_path, as well as absolute paths if innodb_data_home_dir is set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 描述：共享表空间中所有InnoDB数据文件的目录路径（假设未启用innodb_file_per_table）。如果将innodb_data_home_dir设置为空字符串，则可以在innodb_data_file_path和绝对路径中添加特定于文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where GCache files are placed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：放置GCache文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the character sets are installed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在目录字符集安装。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the TokuDB bulk loaders temporary files are stored. Can be very large, and useful to place on a separate disk. By default the variable is empty, in which case the regular datadir is used. tokudb_load_save_space determines whether the data is compressed or not. The error message ERROR 1030 (HY000): Got error 1 from storage engine could indicate that the disk has run out of space.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TokuDB批量加载程序临时文件的存储目录。可能非常大，并且对放置在单独的磁盘上很有用。默认情况下，变量为空，在这种情况下，将使用常规datadir。tokudb_load_save_space确定是否压缩数据。错误消息 ERROR 1030 (HY000): Got error 1 from storage engine 可能表示磁盘空间不足。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the TokuDB data is stored. By default the variable is empty, in which case the regular datadir is used.
trans-unit.target: 描述：存储TokuDB数据的目录。默认情况下，变量为空，在这种情况下，将使用常规datadir。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the TokuDB log files are stored. By default the variable is empty, in which case the regular datadir is used.
trans-unit.target: 描述：存储TokuDB日志文件的目录。默认情况下，变量为空，在这种情况下，将使用常规datadir。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the data is stored.
trans-unit.target: 说明：存储数据的目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where the slave stores temporary files for replicatingLOAD DATA INFILE statements. If not set, the slave will use tmpdir. Should be set to a disk-based directory that will survive restarts, or else replication may fail.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站存储用于复制LOAD DATA INFILE语句的临时文件的目录。如果未设置，则从站将使用tmpdir。应该设置为基于磁盘的目录，该目录将在重新启动后继续存在，否则复制可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: Description: Directory where wsrep provider will store its internal files.
trans-unit.target: 说明： wsrep提供程序将在其中存储其内部文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disable TLS connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用TLS连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disable all rocksdb background operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用所有rocksdb后台操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disable some potential unsafe optimizations. For 5.2, INSERT DELAYED is disabled, myisam_recover_options is set to DEFAULT (automatically recover crashed MyISAM files) and the query cache is disabled. For Aria tables, disable bulk insert optimization to enable one to use aria_read_log to recover tables even if tables are deleted (good for testing recovery).
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用一些潜在的不安全优化。对于5.2，禁用INSERT DELAYED，将myisam_recover_options设置为DEFAULT（自动恢复崩溃的MyISAM文件），并禁用查询缓存。对于Aria表，请禁用大容量插入优化，以使即使表已删除也可以使用aria_read_log恢复表（适用于测试恢复）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disable system thread alarm calls. Disabling it may be useful in debugging or testing, never do it in production.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用系统线程警报调用。禁用它可能在调试或测试中很有用，永远不要在生产中使用它。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disabled by default, enabling it reverts index hints to those used before MySQL 5.1.17. Enabling may lead to replication errors. Being replaced by old_mode. Before MariaDB 5.5, the variable was read-only and global in scope only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认情况下处于禁用状态，启用它会将索引提示恢复为MySQL 5.1.17之前使用的那些。启用可能会导致复制错误。被old_mode取代。在MariaDB 5.5之前，该变量是只读的，并且仅在作用域内全局。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disables --new in 5.2. In 5.1 used to disable some new potentially unsafe functions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用-5.2中的新增功能。在5.1中用于禁用一些新的潜在不安全功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disables the specified counters in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS表中的指定计数器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disables user-defined partitioning. Previously partitioned tables cannot be accessed or modifed. Tables can still be seen with SHOW TABLES or by viewing the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES table. Tables can be dropped with DROP TABLE, but this only removes .frm files, not the associated .par files, which will need to be removed manually.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用用户定义的分区。先前已分区的表无法访问或修改。仍然可以使用SHOW TABLES或通过查看INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES表来查看表。可以使用DROP TABLE删除表，但这只会删除.frm文件，而不会删除相关的.par文件，而需要手动删除这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Discovery is when the server asks the NDBCLUSTER storage engine if it knows about a table with a given name. Handler_discover indicates the number of times that tables have been discovered in this way.
trans-unit.target: 描述：发现是指服务器询问NDBCLUSTER存储引擎是否知道具有给定名称的表时。Handler_discover指示以这种方式发现表的次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Displays help with many commandline options described, and exits.
trans-unit.target: 描述：显示有关许多描述的命令行选项的帮助，然后退出。

trans-unit.source: Description: Do an assert in handler::print_error() if we get a crashed table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果得到崩溃的表，请在handler :: print_error（）中执行一个断言。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't allow new user creation by the user who has no write privileges to the mysql.user table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不允许没有mysql.user表写权限的用户创建新用户。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't allow symlinking of tables. Deprecated and removed in MariaDB 5.5. Use symbolic-links with the skipoption prefix instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不允许对表进行符号链接。在MariaDB 5.5中已弃用并删除。请使用带有 skip 选项前缀的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't cache host names.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不缓存主机名。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't flush key buffers between writes for any MyISAM table. (Deprecated option, use --delay-key-write=all instead.)
trans-unit.target: 说明：不要在两次写入之间为任何MyISAM表刷新键缓冲区。（不建议使用的选项，请改用--delay-key-write = all。）

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't give threads different priorities. Deprecated and removed in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不要为线程赋予不同的优先级。在MariaDB 10.0中已弃用并删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't ignore client side character set value sent during handshake.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不要忽略握手期间发送的客户端字符集值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't log extra information to update and slow-query logs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不要记录额外的信息来更新和慢查询日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't print Notes to the error log during startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在启动过程中不要在错误日志中打印注释。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't produce an error if the option doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果该选项不存在，请不要产生错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't read options from any option file.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不要从任何选项文件中读取选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: Don't use the fast sort index method to created index if the temporary file would get bigger than this.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果临时文件大于此大小，请不要使用快速排序索引方法来创建索引。

trans-unit.source: Description: Drop past views from view history after that timeout.
trans-unit.target: 说明：超时后，将过去的视图从视图历史记录中删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: Dump log of the AWS SDK to MariaDB error log. Permitted values, in increasing verbosity, are Off (default), Fatal, Error, Warn, Info, Debug, and Trace.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将AWS开发工具包的日志转储到MariaDB错误日志。允许的值以增加的详细程度为Off（默认），Fatal，Error，Warn，Info，Debug和Trace。

trans-unit.source: Description: Dump only the hottest N% of each buffer pool, defaults to 100 until MariaDB 10.2.1. Since MariaDB 10.2.2, defaults to 25% along with the changes to innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown and innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup.
trans-unit.target: 描述：仅转储每个缓冲池中最热的N％，默认为100，直到MariaDB 10.2.1为止。自MariaDB 10.2.2起，默认值为25％，同时对innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown和innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Each session performing a sort allocates a buffer with this amount of memory. Not specific to any storage engine. If the status variable sort_merge_passes is too high, you may need to look at improving your query indexes, or increasing this. Consider reducing where there are many small sorts, such as OLTP, and increasing where needed by session. 16k is a suggested minimum.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个执行排序的会话都将为此数量的内存分配一个缓冲区。不特定于任何存储引擎。如果状态变量sort_merge_passes太高，则可能需要考虑改进查询索引或增加查询索引。考虑减少有很多小种类（例如OLTP）的地方，并增加会话需要的地方。建议的最小值为16k。

trans-unit.source: Description: Each thread performing a sequential scan (for MyISAM, Aria and MERGE tables) allocates a buffer of this size in bytes for each table scanned. Increase if you perform many sequential scans. If not in a multiple of 4KB, will be rounded down to the nearest multiple. Also used in ORDER BY's for caching indexes in a temporary file (not temporary table), for caching results of nested queries, for bulk inserts into partitions, and to determine the memory block size of MEMORY tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个执行顺序扫描的线程（对于MyISAM，Aria和MERGE表）将为每个扫描表分配此大小的缓冲区（以字节为单位）。如果执行许多顺序扫描，则增加。如果不是4KB的倍数，则将四舍五入到最接近的倍数。还用于ORDER BY中，用于在临时文件（不是临时表）中缓存索引，用于缓存嵌套查询的结果，用于在分区中批量插入，以及确定MEMORY表的内存块大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Empty by default, when a lock deadlock is detected, or a lock request times out, set to a JSON document describing the most recent lock conflict. Only set when the first bit of tokudb_lock_timeout_debug is set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认情况下为空，当检测到锁死锁或锁请求超时时，将其设置为描述最新锁冲突的JSON文档。仅在设置了tokudb_lock_timeout_debug的第一位时设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable proxy protocol for these source networks. The syntax is a comma separated list of IPv4 and IPv6 networks. If the network doesn't contain a mask, it is considered to be a single host. "*" represents all networks and must be the only directive on the line. String "localhost" represents non-TCP local connections (Unix domain socket, Windows named pipe or shared memory). See Proxy Protocol Support.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为这些源网络启用代理协议。语法是用逗号分隔的IPv4和IPv6网络列表。如果网络不包含掩码，则将其视为单个主机。“ *”代表所有网络，并且必须是该行上的唯一指令。字符串“ localhost”表示非TCP本地连接（Unix域套接字，Windows命名管道或共享内存）。请参阅代理协议支持。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable TLS for connection (automatically enabled with other flags). Disable with '--skip-ssl'.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用TLS进行连接（与其他标志自动启用）。禁止以“ --skip-ssl ”。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable InnoDB lock monitor output to the error log and SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS. Also requires innodb_status_output=ON to enable output to the error log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用InnoDB锁定监视器输出到错误日志和SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS。还要求innodb_status_output = ON启用输出到错误日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable InnoDB monitor output to the error log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用InnoDB监视器输出到错误日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable InnoDB redo log scrubbing. See Data Scrubbing.
trans-unit.target: 描述：启用InnoDB重做日志清理。请参阅数据清理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable condition pushdown
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用条件下推

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable debugging.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用调试。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable expired TTL records to be dropped during compaction.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用在压缩过程中丢弃过期的TTL记录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable file mapping for index files. To accelerate the indexing process, CONNECT makes an index structure in memory from the index file. This can be done by reading the index file or using it as if it was in memory by “file mapping”. Set to 0 (file read, the default) or 1 (file mapping).
trans-unit.target: 说明：为索引文件启用文件映射。为了加快索引编制过程，CONNECT通过索引文件在内存中建立了索引结构。这可以通过读取索引文件或通过“文件映射”将其用作内存中的文件来完成。设置为0（读取文件，默认设置）或1（文件映射）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable old-style user limits (before MySQL 5.0.3, user resources were counted per each user+host vs. per account).
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用旧式用户限制（在MySQL 5.0.3之前，按每个用户+主机与每个帐户计算用户资源）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable or disable query response time statistics collecting
trans-unit.target: 描述：启用或禁用查询响应时间统计信息收集

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable prefix optimization to sometimes avoid cluster index lookups.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用前缀优化有时可以避免集群索引查找。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable scrubbing of compressed data by background threads (same as encryption_threads). See Data Scrubbing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用由后台线程（与encryption_threads相同）清除压缩数据。请参阅数据清理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable scrubbing of data. See Data Scrubbing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用数据清理。请参阅数据清理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable scrubbing of uncompressed data by background threads (same as encryption_threads). See Data Scrubbing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用后台线程（与encryption_threads相同）对未压缩数据的清理。请参阅数据清理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable semaphore request instrumentation. This could have some effect on performance but allows better information on long semaphore wait problems.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用信号量请求检测。这可能会对性能产生一些影响，但可以提供有关长时间信号等待问题的更好信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable symbolic link support. Deprecated option; use --symbolic-links instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用符号链接支持。不推荐使用的选项；使用--symbolic-links代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the Mongo table type.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用Mongo表类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the MyISAM log, which logs all MyISAM changes to file. If no filename is provided, the default, myisam.log is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用MyISAM日志，该日志将所有MyISAM更改记录到文件。如果未提供文件名，则使用默认值myisam.log。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-stages-current consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件阶段当前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-stages-history consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件阶段历史记录使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-stages-history-long consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件阶段历史悠久的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-statements-current consumer. Use --skip-performance-schema-consumer-events-statements-current to disable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件声明当前使用者。使用 --skip-performance-schema-consumer-events-statements-current 禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-statements-history consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件声明历史记录使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-statements-history-long consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件声明历史记录长的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-waits-current consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件等待当前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-waits-history consumer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用事件等待历史记录使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the events-waits-history-long consumer.
trans-unit.target: 描述：启用events-waits-history-long使用者。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the global-instrumentation consumer. Use --skip-performance-schema-consumer-global-instrumentation to disable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用全局仪器使用者。使用 --skip-performance-schema-consumer-global-instrumentation 禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the slave to connect to the master using TLS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：启用从属服务器使用TLS连接到主服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the statements-digest consumer. Use --skip-performance-schema-consumer-statements-digest to disable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用语句摘要使用者。使用 --skip-performance-schema-consumer-statements-digest 禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable the statements-thread-instrumentation. Use --skip-performance-schema-thread-instrumentation to disable.
trans-unit.target: 描述：启用语句-线程-工具。使用 --skip-performance-schema-thread-instrumentation 禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable two phase commit for MyRocks. When set, MyRocks will keep its data consistent with the binary log (in other words, the server will be a crash-safe master). The consistency is achieved by doing two-phase XA commit with the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为MyRocks启用两阶段提交。设置后，MyRocks将使其数据与二进制日志保持一致（换句话说，服务器将是崩溃安全的主服务器）。通过对二进制日志执行两阶段XA提交来实现一致性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable/disable system sync calls. Syncs should only be turned off (--disable-sync-sys) when running tests or debugging! Replaced by debug-no-sync from MariaDB 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用/禁用系统同步调用。仅在运行测试或调试时才应关闭 --disable-sync-sys （--disable-sync-sys）！取而代之的调试没有同步从MariaDB的5.5。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enable/disable system thread alarm calls. Should only be turned off (--disable-thread-alarm) when running tests or debugging!
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用/禁用系统线程警报调用。仅应在运行测试或调试时关闭（ --disable-thread-alarm ）！

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables automatic encryption of all InnoDB tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用所有InnoDB表空间的自动加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables automatic encryption of all internal on-disk temporary tables that are created during query execution if aria_used_for_temp_tables=ON is set. See Data at Rest Encryption and Enabling Encryption for Internal On-disk Temporary Tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置了 aria_used_for_temp_tables=ON ,则启用对在查询执行期间创建的所有内部磁盘临时表的自动加密。请参阅内部磁盘临时表的静态数据加密和启用加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables automatic encryption of all user-created Aria tables that have the ROW_FORMAT table option set to PAGE. See Data at Rest Encryption and Enabling Encryption for User-created Tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对将 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 PAGE 的所有用户创建的Aria表启用自动加密。请参阅静态数据加密和为用户创建的表启用加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables automatic encryption of temporary files, such as those created for filesort operations, binary log file caches, etc. See Data at Rest Encryption.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用对临时文件的自动加密，例如为文件排序操作，二进制日志文件高速缓存等创建的临时文件。请参见静态数据加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables automatic encryption of the InnoDB temporary tablespace.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用InnoDB 临时表空间的自动加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables background confirmation for table statistics. When background confirmation is enabled, Spider uses one thread per partition to maintain table status. Disable when the spider_sts_interval system variable is set to 0, which causes Spider to always retrieve the latest information as need. It is effective, when the spider_sts_interval system variable is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用表统计信息的后台确认。启用后台确认后，Spider会在每个分区使用一个线程来维护表状态。当 spider_sts_interval 系统变量设置为 0 时禁用，这会使Spider始终根据需要检索最新信息。当 spider_sts_interval 系统变量设置为 10 时，它是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables collecting SST file properties on each flush.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用每次刷新时收集SST文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables deadlock detection.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用死锁检测。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables encryption of the InnoDB redo log. This also enables encryption of some temporary files created internally by InnoDB, such as those used for merge sorts and row logs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用InnoDB重做日志的加密。这也可以对InnoDB内部创建的某些临时文件进行加密，例如用于合并排序和行日志的文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables semi-table locking. This adds a LOCK TABLES statement to SQL executions sent to the remote backend server when using non-transactional storage engines to preserve consistency between roundtrips.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用半表锁定。当使用非事务性存储引擎来保持往返之间的一致性时，这会将 LOCK TABLES 语句添加到发送到远程后端服务器的SQL执行中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables semi-transactions. This controls transaction consistency when an SQL statement is split into multiple statements issued to the backend servers. You can preserve or relax consistency as need. Spider encapsulates auto-committed SQL statements within a transaction on the remote backend server. When using READ COMMITTED or READ UNCOMMITTEDtransaction isolation levels to force consistency, set the spider_semi_trx_isolation system variable to 2.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用半事务。将SQL语句拆分为多个发给后端服务器的语句时，这可控制事务的一致性。您可以根据需要保留或放松一致性。Spider将自动提交的SQL语句封装在远程后端服务器上的事务中。使用 READ COMMITTED 或 READ UNCOMMITTED 事务隔离级别强制保持一致性时，请将 spider_semi_trx_isolation 系统变量设置为 2 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables symbolic link support. When set, the have_symlink system variable shows as YES.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用符号链接支持。设置后， have_symlink 系统变量显示为 YES 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables the fake changes feature. In replication, setting up or restarting a slave can cause a replication reads to perform more slowly, as MariaDB is single-threaded and needs to read the data before it can execute the queries. This can be speeded up by prefetching threads to warm the server, replaying the statements and then rolling back at commit. This however has a overhead from locking rows only then to undo changes at rollback. Fake changes attempts to reduce this overhead by reading the rows for INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE statements but not updating them. The rollback is then very fast with little or nothing to do. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用伪造的更改功能。在复制中，设置或重新启动从属服务器可能导致复制读取的执行速度较慢，因为MariaDB是单线程的，需要先读取数据才能执行查询。可以通过预取线程来预热服务器，重播语句然后在提交时回滚来加快速度。但是，这样做只有从锁定行到撤消回滚更改才有开销。伪更改尝试通过读取INSERT，UPDATE和DELETE语句的行但不更新它们来减少这种开销。因此，回滚非常快，几乎不需要执行任何操作。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6中添加为已弃用和忽略的选项 （它使用InnoDB作为默认值而不是XtraDB）来简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables the linking of a table to the same local instance.
trans-unit.target: 说明：允许将表链接到相同的本地实例。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables the specified counters in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS表中的指定计数器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables using SstFileWriter for bulk loading.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用使用SstFileWriter进行批量加载。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables verbose debug logging to the error log for all authentication handled by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为插件处理的所有身份验证启用详细调试日志记录到错误日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables verification of the server's Common Name value in the certificate against the host name used when connecting to the server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可以根据连接到服务器时使用的主机名来验证证书中服务器的“公用名”值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enables/disables the logging. Expected values are ON/OFF. For example: SET GLOBAL server_audit_logging=on If the server_audit_output_type is FILE, this will actually create/open the logfile so the server_audit_file_path should be properly specified beforehand. Same about the SYSLOG-related parameters. The logging is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用/禁用日志记录。期望值为ON / OFF。例如： SET GLOBAL server_audit_logging=on 如果server_audit_output_type为FILE，则实际上将创建/打开日志文件，因此应事先正确指定server_audit_file_path。与SYSLOG相关的参数相同。默认情况下，日志记录处于关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: Description: Encrypt binary logs (including relay logs). See Data at Rest Encryption and Encrypting Binary Logs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：加密二进制日志（包括中继日志）。请参见静态数据加密和二进制日志加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Encryption algorithm used to create new keys
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于创建新密钥的加密算法

trans-unit.source: Description: Encryption key used for page encryption.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于页面加密的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Description: Encryption mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：加密模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Enforce case sensitive collation for MyRocks indexes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对MyRocks索引强制区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Description: Estimate of the total bytes of messages currently in trees.
trans-unit.target: 描述：估计树中当前消息的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Evict pages from the buffer pool. If set to "uncompressed" then all uncompressed pages are evicted from the buffer pool. Variable to be used only for testing. Only exists in DEBUG builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从缓冲池中逐出页面。如果设置为“ uncompressed”，则所有未压缩的页面将从缓冲池中清除。变量仅用于测试。仅存在于DEBUG版本中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Expect that server aborts with 'abort'; Don't write out server variables on 'abort'. Useful only for test scripts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：期望服务器以“ abort”终止。不要在'abort'上写出服务器变量。仅对测试脚本有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Experimental feature (as of MariaDB 10.0.9), this variable specifies how to generate and verify XtraDB redo log checksums. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：实验性功能（自MariaDB 10.0.9起），此变量指定如何生成和验证XtraDB重做日志校验和。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Explicitly enables TLS usage by the wsrep Provider.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过wsrep Provider明确启用TLS使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: External user name set by the plugin used to authenticate the client. NULL if native MariaDB authentication is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由用于身份验证客户端的插件设置的外部用户名。如果使用本机MariaDB身份验证，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Extra port number to use for TCP connections in a one-thread-per-connection manner. If set to 0, then no extra port is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于 one-thread-per-connection TCP连接的额外端口号。如果设置为 0 ，则不使用额外的端口。

trans-unit.source: Description: Fast index creation creates a large tmp file on disk during index creation. Removing this large file all at once when index creation is complete can cause trim stalls on Flash. This variable specifies a duration to sleep (in milliseconds) between calling chsize() to truncate the file in chunks. The chunk size is the same as merge_buf_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：快速索引创建在索引创建过程中在磁盘上创建了一个大的tmp文件。索引创建完成后立即全部删除此大文件可能会导致Flash上​​的调整停顿。此变量指定调用chsize（）截断文件之间的睡眠时间（以毫秒为单位）。块大小与merge_buf_size相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: File containing a list of stopwords for use in MyISAMfull-text searches. Unless an absolute path is specified the file will be looked for in the data directory. The file is not parsed for comments, so all words found become stopwords. By default, a built-in list of words (built from storage/myisam/ft_static.c file) is used. Stopwords can be disabled by setting this variable to '' (an empty string). If this variable is changed, the full-text index must be rebuilt. The quickest way to do this is by issuing a REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK statement. See innodb_ft_server_stopword_table for the InnoDB equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：包含用于MyISAM 全文搜索的停用词列表的文件。除非指定了绝对路径，否则将在数据目录中查找文件。该文件未解析为注释，因此找到的所有单词都变成停用词。默认情况下，使用内置单词列表（从 storage/myisam/ft_static.c file ）。通过将此变量设置为 '' （空字符串），可以禁用停用词。如果更改此变量，则必须重建全文索引。最快的方法是发出 REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK 语句。请参阅innodb_ft_server_stopword_table以获取等效的InnoDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: File format for new InnoDB tables. Can either be Antelope, the default and the original format, or Barracuda, which supports compression. Note that this value is also used when a table is re-created with an ALTER TABLE which requires a table copy. See XtraDB/InnoDB File Format for more on the file formats. Removed in 10.3.1 and restored as a deprecated and unused variable in 10.4.3 for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：新InnoDB表的文件格式。可以是 Antelope （默认和原始格式），也可以是 Barracuda （支持压缩）。请注意，当使用需要表副本的ALTER TABLE重新创建表时，也会使用此值。有关文件格式的更多信息，请参见XtraDB / InnoDB文件格式。为了兼容性起见，已在10.3.1中删除并在10.4.3中作为已弃用和未使用的变量恢复。

trans-unit.source: Description: File that holds the names for last binlog files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：保存最后一个二进制日志文件名称的文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Filter level for info logs to be written mysqld error log. Valid values include 'debug_level', 'info_level', 'warn_level''error_level' and 'fatal_level'.
trans-unit.target: 描述：信息日志的过滤级别，将其写入mysqld错误日志。有效值包括“ debug_level”，“ info_level”，“ warn_level”，“ error_level”和“ fatal_level”。

trans-unit.source: Description: First valid date for the TLS certificate.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TLS证书的第一个有效日期。

trans-unit.source: Description: Flags to customize syntax in BOOLEAN MODE searches. Available flags:
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于在BOOLEAN MODE搜索中自定义语法的标志。可用标志：

trans-unit.source: Description: Flush list as shown in the INSERT BUFFER AND ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：刷新列表，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的INSERT BUFFER和ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX部分中所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Flushed up to log sequence number as shown in the LOG section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：累积到日志序列号，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的LOG部分中所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: For full-text searches, denotes the numer of top matches when using WITH QUERY EXPANSION.
trans-unit.target: 描述：对于全文搜索，表示使用WITH QUERY EXPANSION时最上面匹配的数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: For Linux systems only, specified whether to use Linux's asynchronous I/O subsystem. Set to 1 by default, it may be changed to 0 at startup if XtraDB/InnoDB detects a problem
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅对于Linux系统，指定是否使用Linux的异步I / O子系统。默认设置为 1 ，如果XtraDB / InnoDB检测到问题，则可能在启动时更改为 0

trans-unit.source: Description: For all boolean options, disables the setting (equivalent to setting it to 0). Same as --disable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于所有布尔选项，禁用设置（等同于将其设置为 0 ）。与 --disable 相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: For all boolean options, disables the setting (equivalent to setting it to 0). Same as --skip.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于所有布尔选项，禁用设置（等同于将其设置为 0 ）。与 --skip 相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: For all boolean options, enables the setting (equivalent to setting it to 1).
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于所有布尔选项，启用设置（等效于将其设置为 1 ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: For debug purposes, by default false (true in earlier releases), indicates whether to checksum replicated messages on PC level. Safe to turn off.
trans-unit.target: 描述：出于调试目的，默认情况下为 false （在早期版本中为 true ），指示是否在PC级别上校验复制消息的总和。安全关闭。

trans-unit.source: Description: For debugging purposes only. If true, compaction filtering will not occur on PK TTL data. This variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅用于调试目的。如果为true，则不会对PK TTL数据进行压缩过滤。在非调试版本中，此变量是no-op。

trans-unit.source: Description: For debugging purposes only. Overrides the TTL of records to now() + debug_ttl_rec_ts. The value can be +/- to simulate a record inserted in the past vs a record inserted in the 'future'. A value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. This variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅用于调试目的。将记录的TTL覆盖为now（）+ debug_ttl_rec_ts。该值可以为+/-以模拟过去插入的记录与“未来”插入的记录。值为0表示未设置变量。在非调试版本中，此变量是no-op。

trans-unit.source: Description: For debugging purposes only. Overrides the TTL read filtering time to time + debug_ttl_read_filter_ts. A value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. This variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅用于调试目的。覆盖TTL读取过滤时间+ debug_ttl_read_filter_ts。值为0表示未设置变量。在非调试版本中，此变量是no-op。

trans-unit.source: Description: For debugging purposes only. Sets the snapshot during compaction to now() + debug_set_ttl_snapshot_ts. The value can be positive or negative to simulate a snapshot in the past vs a snapshot created in the 'future'. A value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. This variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅用于调试目的。将压缩期间的快照设置为now（）+ debug_set_ttl_snapshot_ts。该值可以为正值也可以为负值，以模拟过去的快照，而不是在“未来”中创建的快照。值为0表示未设置变量。在非调试版本中，此变量是no-op。

trans-unit.source: Description: For faster incremental backup with Xtrabackup, XtraDB tracks pages with changes written to them according to the XtraDB redo log and writes the information to special changed page bitmap files. This read-only variable is used for controlling this feature. See also innodb_max_changed_pages and innodb_max_bitmap_file_size. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为了使用Xtrabackup更快地进行增量备份，XtraDB会根据XtraDB重做日志来跟踪已写入更改的页面，并将信息写入特殊的已更改页面位图文件。此只读变量用于控制此功能。另请参见innodb_max_changed_pa​​ges和innodb_max_bitmap_file_size。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: For internal use by the server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：供服务器内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: For internal use only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: For internal use. Should not be manually set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：供内部使用。不应手动设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: For showing the status of fail-safe replication. Removed in MySQL 5.6, still present in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于显示故障安全复制的状态。在MySQL 5.6中删除，在MariaDB 10.0中仍然存在。

trans-unit.source: Description: For tables with TTL, expired records are skipped/filtered out during processing and in query results. Disabling this will allow these records to be seen, but as a result rows may disappear in the middle of transactions as they are dropped during compaction. Use with caution.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于具有TTL的表，过期记录将在处理期间和查询结果中被跳过/过滤掉。禁用此功能将可以看到这些记录，但是结果是，在压缩过程中删除行时，行可能会在事务中间消失。请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: For use with MySQL's memcached (not implemented in MariaDB)
trans-unit.target: 说明：与MySQL的memcached一起使用（未在MariaDB中实现）

trans-unit.source: Description: Force ndbcluster to always copy tables at alter table (should only be used if on-line alter table fails).
trans-unit.target: 说明：强制ndbcluster始终将表复制到alter table（仅当在线alter table失败时才应使用）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Force the use of a particular storage engine for new tables. Used to avoid unwanted creation of tables using another engine. For example, setting to InnoDB will prevent any MyISAM tables from being created. If another engine is specified in a CREATE TABLE statement, the outcome depends on whether the NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTIONSQL_MODE has been set or not. If set (the default from MariaDB 10.1.7), the query will fail, while if not set, a warning will be returned and the table created according to the engine specified by this variable. The variable has a session scope, but is only modifiable by a user with the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 说明：强制对新表使用特定的存储引擎。用于避免使用其他引擎不必要地创建表。例如，设置为InnoDB将阻止创建任何MyISAM表。如果在CREATE TABLE语句中指定了另一个引擎，则结果取决于是否设置了 NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION SQL_MODE。如果设置（MariaDB 10.1.7的默认设置），则查询将失败，而如果未设置，则将返回警告，并根据此变量指定的引擎创建表。该变量具有会话作用域，但只能由具有SUPER特权的用户修改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Force to always compute memtable stats.
trans-unit.target: 说明：强制始终计算内存统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Forces memstore flush which may block all write requests so be careful.
trans-unit.target: 说明：强制刷新存储区，这可能会阻止所有写请求，因此请当心。

trans-unit.source: Description: Forces memtable flush on ANALZYE table to get accurate cardinality.
trans-unit.target: 说明：强制对ANALZYE表进行存储器刷新以获取准确的基数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Forces session character set when connecting to the backend server. This can improve connection time performance.
trans-unit.target: 说明：连接到后端服务器时强制设置会话字符集。这样可以提高连接时间性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Forces the time zone setting when connecting to backend servers. This can improve connection performance when you know the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 说明：连接到后端服务器时强制进行时区设置。当您知道时区时，这可以提高连接性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Format for key replication. Can be one of:
trans-unit.target: 描述：密钥复制的格式。可以是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: Description: Fraction of gcs.recv_q_hard_limit after which replication rate is throttled. The rate of throttling increases linearly from zero (the regular, varying rate of replication) at and below csrecv_q_soft_limit to one (full throttling) at gcs.recv_q_hard_limit
trans-unit.target: 说明：gcs.recv_q_hard_limit的分数，之后限制复制速率。从零线性地增加节流的和下面的速率（复制中的常规，变化的速率） csrecv_q_soft_limit 在一个（全节流）gcs.recv_q_hard_limit

trans-unit.source: Description: Free blocks in the Aria page cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Aria页面缓存中的可用块。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Frequency in seconds for the running of the cleaner thread. Setting to 0 turns off cleaner threads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：清洁器线程运行的频率（以秒为单位）。设置为 0 将关闭清洁器线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Frequency of checks for peer inactivity.
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查对等体不活动的频率。

trans-unit.source: Description: Frequency with which undo records are purged. Set by default to every 128 times, reducing this increases the frequency at which rollback segments are freed. See also innodb_undo_log_truncate.
trans-unit.target: 说明：清除撤消记录的频率。默认情况下设置为每128次，减少此设置会增加释放回滚段的频率。另请参见innodb_undo_log_truncate。

trans-unit.source: Description: From MariaDB 10.3.7, an alias for alter_algorithm. Prior to that, if set to 1 (0 is default), MariaDB reverts to the non-optimized, pre-MySQL 5.1, method of processing ALTER TABLE statements. A temporary table is created, the data is copied over, and then the temporary table is renamed to the original.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从MariaDB 10.3.7开始，是alter_algorithm的别名。在此之前，如果设置为 1 （默认为 0 ），MariaDB将恢复为未优化的MySQL 5.1之前的非优化方法，用于处理ALTER TABLE语句。创建一个临时表，将数据复制过来，然后将该临时表重命名为原始表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Full path of the process ID file.
trans-unit.target: 说明：进程ID文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Description: Full table scan batch size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全表扫描批处理大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Functions and triggers can be dangerous when used with replication. Certain types of functions and triggers may have unintended consequences when the statements are applied on a replication slave. For that reason, there are some restrictions on the creation of functions and triggers when the binary log is enabled by default, such as:
trans-unit.target: 描述：与复制一起使用时，功能和触发器可能很危险。将语句应用于复制从站时，某些类型的功能和触发器可能会产生意想不到的后果。因此，默认情况下启用二进制日志时，函数和触发器的创建受到一些限制，例如：

trans-unit.source: Description: Gcache ring buffer storage file name. By default placed in the working directory, changing to another location or partition can reduce disk IO.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Gcache环形缓冲区存储文件名。默认情况下，将其放置在工作目录中，更改为其他位置或分区可以减少磁盘IO。

trans-unit.source: Description: Gcache ring buffer storage size, preallocated on startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Gcache环形缓冲区存储大小，在启动时预先分配。

trans-unit.source: Description: Gcomm thread policy and priority (in the format policy:priority. Priority is an integer, while policy can be one of:
trans-unit.target: 说明： Gcomm线程策略和优先级（格式为 policy:priority 。Priority是整数，而policy可以是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: Description: Generate trace output in the log for each call to the SstFileWriter.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在日志中为对SstFileWriter的每次调用生成跟踪输出。

trans-unit.source: Description: Generates a trace file from libmarias3 on stderr (mysqld.err) for debugging the S3 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从stderr上的libmarias3（mysqld.err）生成跟踪文件，以调试S3协议。

trans-unit.source: Description: Git revision of the RocksDB library used by MyRocks.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MyRocks使用的RocksDB库的Git修订版。

trans-unit.source: Description: Gives control over the index distribution statistics by determining the number of index pages to sample. Higher values produce more disk I/O, but, especially for large tables, produce more accurate statistics and therefore make more effective use of the query optimizer. Lower values than the default are not recommended, as the statistics can be quite inaccurate.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过确定要采样的索引页数来控制索引分布统计信息。较高的值会产生更多的磁盘I / O，但是，尤其是对于大型表，会产生更准确的统计信息，因此可以更有效地使用查询优化器。不建议使用比默认值低的值，因为统计信息可能非常不准确。

trans-unit.source: Description: Global or per-connection memory usage, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全局或每个连接的内存使用量，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Description: Groonga library version.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Groonga库版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Group name in configuration file used when connecting to remote servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：连接到远程服务器时使用的配置文件中的组名。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hash searches as shown in the INSERT BUFFER AND ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. Removed in Percona's XtraDB 5.6 and replaced with the adaptive_hash_searches counter in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS table in Percona 5.6 - MariaDB 10.0 has no equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：散列搜索，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的INSERT BUFFER和ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX部分所示。在Percona的XtraDB 5.6中删除，并在Percona 5.6的INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS表中替换为adaptive_hash_searches计数器-MariaDB 10.0没有等效项。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hide the default row format.
trans-unit.target: 说明：隐藏默认的行格式。

trans-unit.source: Description: History list length as shown in the TRANSACTIONS section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述：历史记录列表的长度，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的TRANSACTIONS部分中所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Holds the GTID that was assigned to the last transaction, or statement that was logged to the binary log. If the binary log is disabled, or if no transaction or statement was executed in the session yet, then the value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 说明：保存分配给最后一个事务的GTID或记录到二进制日志中的语句。如果禁用了二进制日志，或者会话中尚未执行任何事务或语句，则该值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Description: Host name of remote server.
trans-unit.target: 描述：远程服务器的主机名。

trans-unit.source: Description: Host to connect to, if not specified on per-table basis.
trans-unit.target: 说明：要连接的主机（如果未按表指定）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hostname for the S3 service. "s3.amazonaws.com", Amazon S3 service, by default
trans-unit.target: 描述： S3服务的主机名。默认情况下，Amazon S3服务“ s3.amazonaws.com”

trans-unit.source: Description: How much we can throttle replication rate during state transfer (to avoid running out of memory). Set it to 0.0 if stopping replication is acceptable for the sake of completing state transfer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在状态传输过程中可以限制复制速率的多少（以避免耗尽内存）。如果为了完成状态转移而接受停止复制，则将其设置为0.0。

trans-unit.source: Description: How often a transaction was committed out of order.
trans-unit.target: 描述：事务多久无序提交。

trans-unit.source: Description: How often keepalive beacons should be transmitted when there's no other traffic.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当没有其他流量时，应该多久发送一次保持活动信标。

trans-unit.source: Description: How often writesets have been applied out of order, an indicators of parallelization efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写入集被无序应用的频率，这是并行化效率的指标。

trans-unit.source: Description: How often writesets with a higher sequence number were applied before ones with a lower sequence number, implying slow writesets.
trans-unit.target: 描述：具有较高序列号的写集在具有较低序列号的写集之前被应用的频率，这意味着写入集很慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: How the output for the general query log and the slow query log is stored. By default written to file (FILE), it can also be stored in the general_log and slow_log tables in the mysql database (TABLE), or not stored at all (NONE). More than one option can be chosen at the same time, with NONE taking precedence if present. Logs will not be written if logging is not enabled. See Writing logs into tables, and the slow_query_log and general_log server system variables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如何存储常规查询日志和慢速查询日志的输出。默认情况下，写入文件（ FILE ）的文件也可以存储在mysql数据库（ TABLE ）的general_log和slow_log表中，也可以根本不存储（ NONE ）。可以同时选择多个选项，如果存在，则 NONE 优先。如果未启用日志记录，则不会写入日志。请参阅将日志写入表，以及slow_query_log和general_log服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Human-readable explanation of the state.
trans-unit.target: 描述：状态的人类可读解释。

trans-unit.source: Description: ID of encryption key used by default to encrypt InnoDB tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 描述：默认情况下用于加密InnoDB表空间的加密密钥的ID。

trans-unit.source: Description: INSERT batch size.
trans-unit.target: 说明： INSERT批处理大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: If autocommit is set to to 0 (1 is default), setting innodb_table_locks to 1, the default, will cause XtraDB/InnoDB to lock a table internally upon a LOCK TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果将autocommit设置为 0 （默认值为 1 ），则将innodb_table_locks设置为 1 （默认值）将导致XtraDB / InnoDB在LOCK TABLE内部锁定表。

trans-unit.source: Description: If innodb_buffer_pool_size is set to more than 1GB, innodb_buffer_pool_instances divides the InnoDB buffer pool into this many instances. The default was 1 in MariaDB 5.5, but for large systems with buffer pools of many gigabytes, many instances can help reduce contention concurrency. The default is 8 in MariaDB 10 (except on Windows 32-bit, where it varies according to innodb_buffer_pool_size, or from MariaDB 10.2.2, where it is set to 1 if innodb_buffer_pool_size < 1GB). Each instance manages its own data structures and takes an equal portion of the total buffer pool size, so for example if innodb_buffer_pool_size is 4GB and innodb_buffer_pool_instances is set to 4, each instance will be 1GB. Each instance should ideally be at least 1GB in size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果将innodb_buffer_pool_size设置为大于1GB，innodb_buffer_pool_instances会将InnoDB缓冲池划分为多个实例。在MariaDB 5.5中，默认值为1 ，但是对于具有多个千兆字节缓冲池的大型系统，许多实例可以帮助减少争用并发。在MariaDB 10中，默认值为8（Windows 32位除外，根据innodb_buffer_pool_size的不同而有所不同;或者从MariaDB 10.2.2开始，如果innodb_buffer_pool_size则设置为1<1GB）。每个实例管理自己的数据结构，并占用总缓冲池大小的相等部分，因此，例如，如果innodb_buffer_pool_size为4GB且innodb_buffer_pool_instances设置为4，则每个实例将为1GB。理想情况下，每个实例的大小至少应为1GB。

trans-unit.source: Description: If manual heuristic recovery is needed, this option defines the decision to use in the heuristic recovery process. Manual heuristic recovery may be needed if the transaction coordination log is missing or if it doesn't contain all prepared transactions. This option can be set to OFF, COMMIT, or ROLLBACK. The default is OFF. See also the --log-tc server option and the log_tc_size system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果需要手动启发式恢复，则此选项定义在启发式恢复过程中使用的决策。如果缺少事务协调日志或其中不包含所有准备好的事务，则可能需要进行手动启发式恢复。该选项可以设置为 OFF ， COMMIT 或 ROLLBACK 。默认值为 OFF 。另请参见 --log-tc 服务器选项和 log_tc_size 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: If RTREE indexes (used for spatial indexes) are available, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果有RTREE索引（用于空间索引）可用，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If a MyISAM table is created with no DATA DIRECTORY option, the .MYD file is stored in the database directory. When set to 0, the default, if MariaDB finds another .MYD file in the database directory it will overwrite it. Setting this variable to 1 means that MariaDB will return an error instead, just as it usually does in the same situation outside of the database directory. The same applies for .MYI files and no INDEX DIRECTORY option.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果创建的MyISAM表没有DATA DIRECTORY选项，则.MYD文件存储在数据库目录中。设置为 0 时，默认值是，如果MariaDB在数据库目录中找到另一个.MYD文件，它将覆盖它。将此变量设置为 1 意味着MariaDB将返回错误，就像通常在数据库目录之外的相同情况下那样。.MYI文件也是如此，没有INDEX DIRECTORY选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: If a query examines more than this number of rows, it is logged to the slow-query-log. If set to 0, the default, no row limit is used.
trans-unit.target: 描述：如果查询检查的行数超过了此数目，它将记录到slow-query-log中。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则不使用行数限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: If a query takes longer than this many seconds to execute (microseconds can be specified too), the Slow_queries status variable is incremented and, if enabled, the query is logged to the slow query log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：如果查询执行的时间长于此秒数（也可以指定微秒），则Slow_queries状态变量将增加，并且如果启用，查询将记录到慢查询日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: If an undo tablespace is larger than this, it will be marked for truncation if innodb_undo_log_truncate is set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果撤消表空间大于此值，并且设置了innodb_undo_log_truncate，它将被标记为截断。

trans-unit.source: Description: If cardinality is zero, override it with some value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果基数为零，则用一些值覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Description: If not empty, it contains a comma-delimited list of users whose activity will be logged. For example: SET GLOBAL server_audit_incl_users='user_foo, user_bar'. CONNECT records aren't affected by this variable - they are always logged. This setting has higher priority than server_audit_excl_users. So if the same user is specified both in incl_ and excl_ lists, they will still be logged.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果不为空，则包含将记录其活动的用户的逗号分隔列表。例如： SET GLOBAL server_audit_incl_users='user_foo, user_bar' 。 CONNECT记录不受此变量的影响-始终记录它们。此设置的优先级高于server_audit_excl_users。因此，如果在incl_和excl_列表中都指定了同一用户，则仍将其记录下来。

trans-unit.source: Description: If not empty, it contains the list of users whose activity will NOT be logged. For example: SET GLOBAL server_audit_excl_users='user_foo, user_bar'. CONNECT records aren't affected by this variable - they are always logged. The user is still logged if it's specified in server_audit_incl_users.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果不为空，则包含将不记录其活动的用户列表。例如： SET GLOBAL server_audit_excl_users='user_foo, user_bar' 。CONNECT记录不受此变量的影响-始终记录它们。如果在server_audit_incl_users中指定了该用户，则仍会记录该用户。

trans-unit.source: Description: If prefetching is not disabled (the default), range queries usually benefit from aggressive prefetching of blocks of rows. For range queries with LIMIT clauses, this can create unnecessary IO, and so prefetching can be disabled if these make up a majority of range queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果未禁用预取（默认设置），则范围查询通常受益于对行块的主动预取。对于带有LIMIT子句的范围查询，这可能会创建不必要的IO，因此，如果这些查询占大多数范围查询，则可以禁用预取。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set (the default), MariaDB uses the MySQL 5.6 low level formats for TIME, DATETIME and TIMESTAMP instead of the MariaDB 5.3 version. The version MySQL introduced in 5.6 requires more storage, but potentially allows negative dates and has some advantages in replication. There should be no reason to revert to the old MariaDB 5.3 microsecond format. See also MDEV-10723.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置（默认设置），MariaDB将MySQL 5.6低级格式用于TIME，DATETIME和TIMESTAMP，而不是MariaDB 5.3版本。 5.6中引入的MySQL版本需要更多存储空间，但可能允许使用负日期，并且在复制方面具有一些优势。应该没有理由恢复到旧的MariaDB 5.3微秒格式。另请参阅MDEV-10723。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set the 1, the default, XtraDB/InnoDB will use the operating system's memory allocator. If set to 0 it will use its own. Deprecated in MariaDB 10.0 and removed in MariaDB 10.2 along with InnoDB's internal memory allocator.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果将默认值设置为 1 ，则XtraDB / InnoDB将使用操作系统的内存分配器。如果设置为 0 ，它将使用自己的。MariaDB 10.0中已弃用，并且与InnoDB的内部内存分配器一起在MariaDB 10.2中删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0 (1 is the default), no logging to the binary log is done for the client. Only clients with the SUPER privilege can update this variable. Can have unintended consequences if set globally, see SET SQL_LOG_BIN. Starting MariaDB 10.1.7, this variable does not affect the replication of events in a Galera cluster.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为0（默认值为1），则不会为客户端完成对二进制日志的记录。只有具有SUPER特权的客户端才能更新此变量。如果全局设置，可能会产生意想不到的后果，请参阅SET SQL_LOG_BIN。从 MariaDB 10.1.7 开始，此变量不会影响Galera集群中事件的复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, MariaDB will not perform large SELECTs. See max_join_size for details. If max_join_size is set to anything but DEFAULT, sql_big_selects is automatically set to 0. If sql_big_selects is again set, max_join_size will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为0，MariaDB将不执行大型SELECT。有关详细信息，请参见max_join_size。如果将max_join_size设置为DEFAULT以外的任何值，则sql_big_selects会自动设置为0。如果再次设置sql_big_selects，则max_join_size将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, the default unless the --general-log option is used, the general query log is disabled, while if set to 1, the general query log is enabled. See log_output for how log files are written. If that variable is set to NONE, no logs will be written even if general_query_log is set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为0，则默认设置，除非使用--general-log选项，否则禁用常规查询日志；如果设置为1，则启用常规查询日志。有关如何写入日志文件，请参见log_output。如果该变量设置为 NONE ，即使将general_query_log设置为 1 ，也不会写入任何日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, the default unless the --slow-query-log option is used, the slow query log is disabled, while if set to 1 (both global and session variables), the slow query log is enabled. MariaDB 10.1 added support for session variables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为0（默认值，除非使用--slow-query-log选项），则禁用慢速查询日志，而如果设置为1（全局变量和会话变量），则启用慢速查询日志。MariaDB 10.1添加了对会话变量的支持。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), results from SELECT statements are always placed into temporary tables. This can help the server when it takes a long time to send the results to the client by allowing the table locks to be freed early.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则SELECT语句的结果始终放置在临时表中。通过允许表锁提前释放，这可以在服务器花费很长时间将结果发送到客户端时为服务器提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is the default), for storage engines that use only table-level locking (Aria, MyISAM, MEMORY and MERGE), all INSERTs, UPDATEs, DELETEs and LOCK TABLE WRITEs will wait until there are no more SELECTs or LOCK TABLE READs pending on the relevant tables. Set this to 1 if reads are prioritized over writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则对于仅使用表级锁定（Aria，MyISAM，MEMORY和MERGE）的存储引擎，所有INSERT，UPDATE，DELETE和LOCK TABLE WRITE都将等待，直到没有更多在相关表上的SELECT或LOCK TABLE READs未决。如果读取优先于写入，则将其设置为1。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is the default), no logging to the general query log is done for the client. Only clients with the SUPER privilege can update this variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则不会为客户端完成对常规查询日志的记录。只有具有SUPER特权的客户端才能更新此变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is the default), only IP addresses are used for connections. Host names are not resolved. All host values in the GRANT tables must be IP addresses (or localhost).
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则仅IP地址用于连接。主机名不解析。GRANT表中的所有主机值都必须是IP地址（或localhost）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is the default), will use compression for the slave/master protocol if both master and slave support this.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则如果主站和从站都支持压缩，则将从站/主站协议将使用压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (the default) foreign key constraints (including ON UPDATE and ON DELETE behavior) InnoDB tables are checked, while if set to 0, they are not checked. 0 is not recommended for normal use, though it can be useful in situations where you know the data is consistent, but want to reload data in a different order from that that specified by parent/child relationships. Setting this variable to 1 does not retrospectively check for inconsistencies introduced while set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认）外键约束（包括ON UPDATE和ON DELETE行为），则检查InnoDB表，而如果设置为0，则不检查它们。不建议正常使用 0 ，尽管在您知道数据一致但想要以不同于父子关系指定的顺序重新加载数据的情况下，它很有用。将此变量设置为1不会追溯检查设置为0时引入的不一致情况。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, (0 is the default), only users with the SHOW DATABASES privilege can use the SHOW DATABASES statement to see all database names.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则只有具有SHOW DATABASES特权的用户才能使用SHOW DATABASES语句查看所有数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, (0 is the default), the server does not listen for TCP/IP connections. All interaction with the server by be through socket files (Unix) or named pipes or shared memory (Windows). It's recommended to use this option if only local clients are permitted to connect to the server. Enabling this option also prevents a server from functioning as a replication client.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值为0），则服务器不侦听TCP / IP连接。与服务器的所有交互都通过套接字文件（Unix）或命名管道或共享内存（Windows）实现。如果仅允许本地客户端连接到服务器，建议使用此选项。启用此选项还会阻止服务器充当复制客户端。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, UPDATEs and DELETEs need either a key in the WHERE clause, or a LIMIT clause, or else they will aborted. Prevents the common mistake of accidentally deleting or updating every row in a table. Until MariaDB 10.3.11, could not be set as a command-line option or in my.cnf.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则UPDATE和DELETE需要WHERE子句中的键或LIMIT子句，否则它们将中止。防止意外删除或更新表中的每一行的常见错误。在MariaDB 10.3.11之前，无法将其设置为命令行选项或在my.cnf中。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, provides better queueing time statistics by using a high precision timestamp, at a small performance cost, for the time when the connection was added to the queue. This timestamp helps calculate the queuing time shown in the Information Schema Threadpool_Queues table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则在连接添加到队列的时间中，通过使用高精度时间戳以较低的性能代价提供更好的排队时间统计信息。此时间戳有助于计算信息架构Threadpool_Queues表中显示的排队时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, single-row INSERTs will produce a string containing warning information if a warning occurs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则如果发生警告，单行INSERT将产生一个包含警告信息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, warning_count is incremented each time a Note warning is encountered. If set to 0, Note warnings are not recorded. mysqldump has outputs to set this variable to 0 so that no unnecessary increments occur when data is reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则每次遇到Note警告时，默认的warning_count都会增加。如果设置为0，则不会记录注释警告。mysqldump具有将这个变量设置为0的输出，因此在重新加载数据时不会发生不必要的增量。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, all queries are committed immediately. The LOCK IN SHARE MODE and FOR UPDATE clauses therefore have no effect. If set to 0, they are only committed upon a COMMIT statement, or rolled back with a ROLLBACK statement. If autocommit is set to 0, and then changed to 1, all open transactions are immediately committed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为默认值1，则所有查询将立即提交。因此，LOCK IN SHARE MODE和FOR UPDATE子句无效。如果设置为0，则它​​们仅在COMMIT语句上提交，或通过ROLLBACK语句回滚。如果autocommit设置为0，然后更改为1，则所有打开的事务将立即提交。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, each time a non-temporary table is created, its .frm definition file is synced to disk. Fractionally slower, but safer in case of a crash.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1（默认值），则每次创建一个非临时表时，其.frm定义文件都会同步到磁盘。速度稍慢，但在发生碰撞时更安全。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, secondary indexes in InnoDB tables are performed. If set to 0, storage engines can (but are not required to) assume that duplicate keys are not present in input data. Set to 0 to speed up imports of large tables to InnoDB. The storage engine will still issue a duplicate key error if it detects one, even if set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则执行InnoDB表中的默认二级索引。如果设置为0，则存储引擎可以（但不是必须）假定输入数据中不存在重复的键。设置为0可以加快将大型表导入InnoDB的速度。即使将其设置为0，存储引擎仍会检测到一个重复的密钥错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, the server will quote identifiers for SHOW CREATE DATABASE, SHOW CREATE TABLE and SHOW CREATE VIEW statements. Quoting is disabled if set to 0. Enable to ensure replications works when identifiers require quoting.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为默认值1，则服务器将引用SHOW CREATE DATABASE，SHOW CREATE TABLE和SHOW CREATE VIEW语句的标识符。如果设置为0，则禁用报价。启用此选项可确保在标识符需要报价时复制能够正常进行。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the query SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE auto_increment_column IS NULL will return an auto-increment that has just been successfully inserted, the same as the LAST_INSERT_ID() function. Some ODBC programs make use of this IS NULL comparison.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，查询 SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE auto_increment_column IS NULL 将返回刚刚成功插入的自动增量，与LAST_INSERT_ID（）函数相同。一些ODBC程序使用此IS NULL比较。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, then each group will have its own dedicated listener, and the listener thread will not pick up work items. As a result, the queueing time in the Information Schema Threadpool_Queues and the actual queue size in the Information Schema Threadpool_Groups table will be more exact, since IO requests are immediately dequeued from poll, without delay.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为1，则每个组将有其自己的专用侦听器，并且侦听器线程将不接收工作项。结果，信息 IO 线程池_队列中的排队时间和信息奥体Threadpool_Groups表中的实际队列大小将更加准确，因为IO请求将立即从轮询中出队，而不会产生延迟。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0 (1 is default), fast bulk loading will be switched off. Usually, TokuDB obtains a table lock on empty tables. If, as is usual, only one transaction is loading the table, this speeds up the inserts. However, if many transactions are loading, only one can have access at a time, so setting this to 0, avoiding the lock, will speed inserts up in that situation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 （默认为 1 ），则将关闭快速批量加载。通常，TokuDB在空表上获取表锁。如果像往常一样，仅一个事务正在加载表，则这将加快插入速度。但是，如果正在加载许多事务，则一次只能访问一个事务，因此将其设置为 0 （避免锁定）将在这种情况下加快插入速度。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0 (1 is default), index statistics will not be automatically calculated except when an ANALYZE TABLE is run, or the table is first opened. Replaced by innodb_stats_auto_recalc in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 （默认值为 1 ），则除非运行ANALYZE TABLE或首次打开该表，否则不会自动计算索引统计信息。在MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中由innodb_stats_auto_recalc代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0 (the default on Unix-based systems), table names and aliases and database names are compared in a case-sensitive manner. If set to 1 (the default on Windows), names are stored in lowercase and not compared in a case-sensitive manner. If set to 2 (the default on Mac OS X), names are stored as declared, but compared in lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 （基于Unix的系统上的默认设置），则以区分大小写的方式比较表名，别名和数据库名。如果设置为 1 （Windows上的默认设置），则名称以小写形式存储，并且不区分大小写。如果设置为 2 （Mac OS X上的默认设置），则名称按声明存储，但以小写字母进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, the query cache is disabled (although a buffer of query_cache_size bytes is still allocated). If set to 1 all SELECT queries will be cached unless SQL_NO_CACHE is specified. If set to 2 (or DEMAND), only queries with the SQL CACHE clause will be cached. Note that if the server is started with the query cache disabled, it cannot be enabled at runtime. Starting from MariaDB 10.1.7, query_cache_type is automatically set to ON if the server is started with the query_cache_size set to a non-zero (and non-default) value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 ，则禁用查询缓存（尽管仍分配query_cache_size个字节的缓冲区）。如果设置为 1 ,除非指定SQL_NO_CACHE，否则所有SELECT查询都将被缓存。如果设置为 2 （或 DEMAND ），则仅缓存带有SQL CACHE子句的查询。请注意，如果在禁用查询缓存的情况下启动服务器，则无法在运行时启用服务器。从MariaDB 10.1.7开始，如果在将query_cache_size设置为非零（非默认）值的情况下启动服务器，则query_cache_type将自动设置为ON 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, the default, results present in the query cache will be returned even if there's a write lock on the table. If set to 1, the client will first have to wait for the lock to be released.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 （默认值），即使表上有写锁，也会返回查询缓存中存在的结果。如果设置为 1 ，则客户端将首先必须等待锁定被释放。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, the default, updates on a slave received from a master during replication are not logged in the slave's binary log. If set to 1, they are. The slave's binary log needs to be enabled for this to have an effect. Set to 1 if you want to daisy-chain the slaves.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 （默认值），则复制期间从主服务器接收到的从服务器上的更新不会记录在从服务器的二进制日志中。如果设置为 1 ，则为。需要启用从站的二进制日志才能生效。如果要以菊花链方式连接从站，则设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 0, will disable constraint checks, for example when loading a table that violates some constraints that you plan to fix later.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 0 ，将禁用约束检查，例如，在加载违反某些计划稍后修复的约束的表时。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), enables the Performance Schema
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认为0），则启用性能模式

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), memory mapping will be used to reading and writing MyISAM tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值为0），则将使用内存映射来读取和写入MyISAM表。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default) CREATE TABLEs without a primary or unique key where all keyparts are NOT NULL will not be accepted, and will return an error.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则不接受所有主键部分都不为NULL且没有主键或唯一键的CREATE TABLE，并且将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default) and recovery is necessary on startup, the server will write detailed recovery statistics to the error log at the end of the recovery process. This Percona XtraDB variable has not been ported to XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ）并且在启动时需要恢复，则服务器将在恢复过程结束时将详细的恢复统计信息写入错误日志。此Percona XtraDB变量尚未移植到XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), MariaDB reverts to using the mysql_old_password authentication plugin by default for newly created users and passwords, instead of the mysql_native_password authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则对于新创建的用户和密码，MariaDB默认恢复为使用 mysql_old_password 认证插件，而不是 mysql_native_password 认证插件。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), XtraDB will use the SYS_STATS system table for extra table index statistics. When a table is opened for the first time, statistics will then be loaded from SYS_STATS instead of sampling the index pages. Statistics are designed to be maintained only by running an ANALYZE TABLE. Replaced by MySQL 5.6's Persistent Optimizer Statistics.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则XtraDB将使用SYS_STATS系统表获取额外的表索引统计信息。首次打开表时，将从SYS_STATS加载统计信息，而不是对索引页进行采样。统计信息只能通过运行ANALYZE TABLE来维护。取而代之的是MySQL 5.6的Persistent Optimizer Statistics。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), XtraDB will wait until the least-recently used (LRU) dump is completely restored upon restart before reporting back to the server that it has successfully started up. Available with XtraDB only, not InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则XtraDB将等待，直到重新启动时完全还原了最近最少使用（LRU）转储，然后才向服务器报告已成功启动。仅适用于XtraDB，不适用于InnoDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), all XtraDB/InnoDB transaction deadlock information is written to the error log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则所有XtraDB / InnoDB事务死锁信息都将写入错误日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), generate zlib header and trailer and compute adler32 check value. It can be used with storage engines that don't provide data integrity verification to detect data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则生成zlib标头和标尾并计算adler32检查值。它可以与不提供数据完整性验证以检测数据损坏的存储引擎一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), on startup the slave will drop all relay logs that haven't yet been processed, and retrieve relay logs from the master. Can be useful after the slave has crashed to prevent the processing of corrupt relay logs. relay_log_recovery should always be set together with relay_log_purge. Setting relay-log-recovery=1 with relay-log-purge=0 can cause the relay log to be read from files that were not purged, leading to data inconsistencies.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （ 0 为默认值），在启动时从机将放弃所有的中继日志尚未被处理，并从主检索中继日志。从站崩溃后可能有用，以防止处理损坏的中继日志。 relay_log_recovery应该始终与relay_log_purge一起设置。将 relay-log-recovery=1 设置为 relay-log-purge=0 可能导致从未清除的文件中读取继电器日志，从而导致数据不一致。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), statement profiling will be enabled. See SHOW PROFILES() and SHOW PROFILE().
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则将启用语句分析。请参阅SHOW PROFILES（）和SHOW PROFILE（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), the operating system file system cache for merge-sort temporary files is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则禁用合并排序临时文件的操作系统文件系统缓存。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), the relay log info file will be overwritten on crash recovery if the information differs from the InnoDB record. Should not be used if multiple storage engine types are being replicated. Previously named innodb_overwrite_relay_log_info. Removed in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 and replaced by MySQL 5.6's relay-log-recovery
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则当崩溃日志信息与InnoDB记录不同时，中继日志信息文件将在崩溃恢复时被覆盖。如果要复制多种存储引擎类型，则不应使用。以前命名为 innodb_overwrite_relay_log_info 。在MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，并由MySQL 5.6的 relay-log-recovery 取代

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), the server will be read-only. For use in distributed applications, data warehouses or read-only media.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则服务器将是只读的。用于分布式应用程序，数据仓库或只读介质。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is default), the server will strip any comments from the query before searching to see if it exists in the query cache. Multiple space, line feeds, tab and other white space characters will also be removed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），服务器将在搜索之前删除查询中的所有注释以查看其是否存在于查询缓存中。多个空格，换行符，制表符和其他空白字符也将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (0 is the default before MariaDB 10.2.2), XtraDB/InnoDB will return errors instead of warnings in certain cases, similar to strict SQL mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （MariaDB 10.2.2之前的默认 0 ），则在某些情况下，XtraDB / InnoDB将返回错误而不是警告，类似于严格的SQL模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (the default), relay logs will be purged as soon as they are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则中继日志将在不再需要时被清除。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (the default), persistent statistics are automatically recalculated when the table changes significantly (more than 10% of the rows). Affects tables created or altered with STATS_PERSISTENT=1 (see CREATE TABLE), or when innodb_stats_persistent is enabled. innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages determines how much data to sample when recalculating. See InnoDB Persistent Statistics.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则当表发生显着变化（超过10％的行）时，将自动重新计算持久性统计信息。影响使用STATS_PERSISTENT = 1创建或更改的表（请参见CREATE TABLE），或者启用innodb_stats_persistent时。innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages确定重新计算时要采样的数据量。参见InnoDB持久统计。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (the default), the bulk fetch algorithm is used for SELECT's and DELETE's, including related statements such as INSERT INTO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则批量获取算法用于SELECT和DELETE，包括相关语句，例如INSERT INTO。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1 (the default), will automatically adjust the auto_increment_increment and auto_increment_offset variables according to the size of the cluster, and when the cluster size changes. This avoids replication conflicts due to auto_increment. In a master-slave environment, can be set to OFF.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），将根据集群的大小以及集群大小的变化自动调整auto_increment_increment和auto_increment_offset变量。这样可以避免由于auto_increment造成的复制冲突。在主从环境中，可以设置为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, user statistics will be activated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则将激活用户统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, LOCAL is supported for LOAD DATA INFILE statements. If set to 0, usually for security reasons, attempts to perform a LOAD DATA LOCAL will fail with an error message.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则LOAD DATA INFILE语句支持LOCAL 。如果将其设置为 0 ，通常出于安全原因，尝试执行LOAD DATA LOCAL将会失败，并显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, additional full-text search diagnostic output is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则启用附加的全文本搜索诊断输出。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, an XtraDB/InnoDB Change Buffering debug flag is set. 1 forces all changes to the change buffer, while 2 causes a crash at merge. 0, the default, indicates no flag is set. Only available in debug builds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，那么将设置XtraDB / InnoDB更改缓冲调试标志。 1 强制所有更改到更改缓冲区，而 2 导致合并时崩溃。默认值 0 表示未设置标志。仅在调试版本中可用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, and innodb_status_output_locks is also ON, the traditional InnoDB behavior is followed and locked records will be shown in SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. If set to 0, the default, only high-level information about the lock is shown. XtraDB only.
