Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，并且innodb_status_output_locks也为ON，则遵循传统的InnoDB行为，并且锁定的记录将显示在SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出中。如果设置为 0 ，则默认为仅显示有关锁的高级信息。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, permits importing of .ibd files exported with the XtraBackup --export option. Previously named innodb_expand_import. Removed in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 and replaced with MySQL 5.6's transportable tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则允许导入使用XtraBackup --export选项导出的.ibd文件。以前名为 innodb_expand_import 。在MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，并替换为MySQL 5.6的可移动表空间。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, tables that use specific [innodb-row-formats-overview|row formats]] are permitted to have index key prefixes up to 3072 bytes. If not set, the limit is 767 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则允许使用特定[innodb-row-formats-overview | row格式]的表具有最多3072个字节的索引键前缀。如果未设置，则限制为767个字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the CRC32C for Innodb or innodb_log_checksum_algorithm for XtraDB algorithm is used for InnoDB redo log pages. If disabled, the checksum field contents are ignored. From MariaDB 10.5.0, the variable is deprecated, and checksums are always calculated, as previously, the InnoDB redo log used the slow innodb algorithm, but with hardware or SIMD assisted CRC-32C computation being available, there is no reason to allow checksums to be disabled on the redo log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则用于Innodb的CRC32C或用于XtraDB算法的 innodb_log_checksum_algorithm 用于InnoDB重做日志页面。如果禁用，则校验和字段的内容将被忽略。从MariaDB 10.5.0开始，不赞成使用该变量，并且始终会计算校验和，就像以前一样，InnoDB重做日志使用慢innodb算法，但是在硬件或SIMD辅助的CRC-32C计算可用的情况下，没有理由允许校验和在重做日志中被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, InnoDB checks the shared tablespace file format tag. If this is higher than the current version supported by XtraDB/InnoDB (for example Barracuda when only Antelope is supported), XtraDB/InnoDB will will not start. If it the value is not higher, XtraDB/InnoDB starts correctly and the innodb_file_format_max value is set to this value. If innodb_file_format_check is set to 0, no checking is performed. See XtraDB/InnoDB File Format for more on the file formats.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则默认为InnoDB检查共享表空间文件格式标记。如果此版本高于XtraDB / InnoDB支持的当前版本（例如，仅支持Antelope的梭子鱼），则XtraDB / InnoDB将不会启动。如果该值不更高，则XtraDB / InnoDB可以正确启动，并且innodb_file_format_max值设置为该值。如果innodb_file_format_check设置为 0 ，则不执行任何检查。有关文件格式的更多信息，请参见XtraDB / InnoDB文件格式。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, XA transactions are supported. XA support ensures data is written to the binary log in the same order to the actual database, which is critical for replication and disaster recovery, but comes at a small performance cost. If your database is set up to only permit one thread to change data (for example, on a replication slave with only the replication thread writing), it is safe to turn this option off. Removed in MariaDB 10.3, XA transactions are always supported.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则支持XA事务。 XA支持可确保将数据以相同顺序写入到实际数据库中的二进制日志中，这对于复制和灾难恢复至关重要，但性能成本较低。如果您的数据库设置为仅允许一个线程更改数据（例如，在只复制复制线程的复制从属服务器上），则可以安全地关闭此选项。在MariaDB 10.3中已删除，始终支持XA事务。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, XtraDB/InnoDB updates statistics when accessing the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES or INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STATISTICS tables, and when running metadata statements such as SHOW INDEX or SHOW TABLE STATUS. If set to 0, statistics are not updated at those times, which can reduce the access time for large schemas, as well as make execution plans more stable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则XtraDB / InnoDB在访问INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES或INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STATISTICS表时，以及在运行诸如SHOW INDEX或SHOW TABLE STATUS之类的元数据语句时，将更新统计信息。如果将其设置为 0 ，则此时将不更新统计信息，这可以减少大型模式的访问时间，并使执行计划更加稳定。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, a set of stopwords is associated with an InnoDB FULLTEXT index when it is created. The stopword list comes from the table set by the session variable innodb_ft_user_stopword_table, if set, otherwise the global variable innodb_ft_server_stopword_table, if that is set, or the built-in list if neither variable is set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则在创建InnoDB FULLTEXT索引时会将一组停用词与之关联。停用词列表来自会话变量innodb_ft_user_stopword_table设置的表（如果已设置），否则来自全局变量innodb_ft_server_stopword_table（如果已设置），或者来自内置列表（如果两个变量均未设置）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, bulk loader intermediate data is compressed, otherwise it is uncompressed. Also see tokudb_tmp_dir.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则默认压缩大容量装载程序中间数据，否则不压缩。另请参阅tokudb_tmp_dir。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, the InnoDB hash index is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则启用InnoDB哈希索引。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, the optimizer will use heuristics to prune less-promising partial plans from the optimizer search space. If set to 0, heuristics are disabled and an exhaustive search is performed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），那么优化器将使用启发式方法从优化器搜索空间中修剪不太有希望的局部计划。如果设置为 0 ，则会禁用启发式搜索，并执行详尽的搜索。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, the server will dynamically adjust the flush rate of dirty pages in the InnoDB buffer pool. This assists to reduce brief bursts of I/O activity.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值），则服务器将动态调整InnoDB缓冲池中脏页的刷新率。这有助于减少I / O活动的短暂爆发。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, the default, to improve fault tolerance InnoDB first stores data to a doublewrite buffer before writing it to data file. Disabling will provide a marginal peformance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 （默认值）以提高容错能力，则InnoDB首先将数据存储到doublewrite缓冲区中，然后再将其写入数据文件中。禁用将改善性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to 1, thread concurrency will be handled in a lock-free timer-based manner rather than the default mutex-based method. Depends on atomic op builtins being available. This Percona XtraDB variable has not been ported to XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 1 ，则线程并发将以无锁的基于计时器的方式而非默认的基于互斥锁的方式进行处理。取决于可用的原子操作内置函数。此Percona XtraDB变量尚未移植到XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to AUTO or 1, the default, MariaDB allows concurrent INSERTs and SELECTs for MyISAM tables with no free blocks in the data. If set to NEVER or 0, concurrent inserts are disabled. If set to ALWAYS or 2, concurrent inserts are permitted for all MyISAM tables, even those with holes, in which case new rows are added at the end of a table if the table is being used by another thread. If the --skip-new option is used when starting the server, concurrent_insert is set to NEVER.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 AUTO 或 1 （默认值），MariaDB允许MyISAM表的并发INSERT和SELECTs 在数据中没有空闲块。如果设置为 NEVER 或 0 ，则禁用并发插入。如果设置为 ALWAYS 或 2 ，则允许所有MyISAM表（即使是有孔的表）并发插入，在这种情况下，如果该表被另一个线程使用，则在表的末尾添加新行。如果在启动服务器时使用了--skip-new选项，则parallel_insert设置为 NEVER 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to OFF (ON is default), and binlog_format to ROW and read_only to ON, TokuDB replication slaves will not perform row lookups for update or delete row log events, removing the need for the associated IO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 OFF （默认为 ON ），并且binlog_format设置为 ROW ，read_only设置为 ON ，则TokuDB复制从属将不执行行查找以更新或删除行日志事件，从而无需关联的IO。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to OFF (ON is default), and binlog_format to ROW and read_only to ON, TokuDB replication slaves will skip uniqueness checks on inserts and updates, removing the associated IO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 OFF （默认为 ON ），并且binlog_format设置为 ROW 且read_only设置为 ON ，TokuDB复制从属将跳过对插入和更新的唯一性检查，并删除关联的IO。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to OFF, fake transactions (see innodb_fake_changes) don't take row locks. This is an experimental feature to attempt to deal with drawbacks in fake changes blocking real locks. It is not safe for use in all environments. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 OFF ，则伪造的交易（请参阅innodb_fake_changes）不会获取行锁。这是一项实验性功能，可以尝试解决假更改阻止真实锁的缺陷。在所有环境中使用它都是不安全的。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), a signal handler for SIGUSR2 is installed when the InnoDB server starts. When a long semaphore wait is detected at sync/sync0array.c, a SIGUSR2 signal is sent to the waiting thread and thread that has acquired the RW-latch. For both threads a full stacktrace is produced as well as if possible. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），则在InnoDB服务器启动时将安装SIGUSR2的信号处理程序。当在sync / sync0array.c中检测到长时间的信号量等待时，SIGUSR2信号将发送到等待线程和已获取RW锁存器的线程。对于两个线程，也会尽可能生成完整的堆栈跟踪。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), details of conflicting MDL as well as InnoDB locks in the cluster will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），则会记录群集中发生冲突的MDL以及InnoDB锁的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), enforces read-committed characteristics across the cluster. In the case that a master applies an event more quickly than a slave, the two could briefly be out-of-sync. With this variable set to ON, the slave will wait for the event to be applied before processing further queries. Setting to ON also results in larger read latencies. Deprecated by wsrep_sync_wait=1.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），则在整个集群中强制执行读取提交的特征。如果主机比从机更快地应用事件，则两者可能会短暂地不同步。在将此变量设置为 ON 的情况下，从属将等待事件应用，然后再处理其他查询。设置为 ON 也将导致更大的读取延迟。wsrep_sync_wait = 1弃用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), hot alter table is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），则禁用热变更表。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), per-index compression statistics are stored in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_CMP_PER_INDEX table. These are expensive to record, so this setting should only be changed with care, such as for performance tuning on development or slave servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），则按索引压缩统计信息存储在INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_CMP_PER_INDEX表中。这些记录非常昂贵，因此仅应谨慎更改此设置，例如在开发或从属服务器上进行性能调整时。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (OFF is default), the donor node will reject incoming queries, returning an UNKNOWN COMMAND error code. Can be used for informing load balancers that a node is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ），施主节点将拒绝传入的查询，并返回 UNKNOWN COMMAND 错误代码。可以用于通知负载均衡器节点不可用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (the default for MariaDB 10.4.2 and before), LOAD DATA INFILE supports big data files by introducing transaction splitting. The setting has been deprecated in Galera 4, and defaults to OFF from MariaDB 10.4.3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （MariaDB 10.4.2和更低版本的默认设置），则LOAD DATA INFILE通过引入事务拆分来支持大数据文件。该设置已在Galera 4中弃用，并且从MariaDB 10.4.3默认为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON when the server starts, the server will recover the sequence number of the most recent write set applied by Galera, and it will be output to stderr, which is usually redirected to the error log. At that point, the server will exit. This sequence number can be provided to the wsrep_start_position system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果在服务器启动时将其设置为 ON ，则服务器将恢复Galera应用的最新写集的序列号，并将其输出到 stderr ，通常将其重定向到错误日志。此时，服务器将退出。可以将此序列号提供给 wsrep_start_position 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, a workaround for Drupal/MySQL/InnoDB bug #282555 is enabled. This is a bug where, in some cases, when inserting a DEFAULT value into an AUTO_INCREMENT column, a duplicate key error may be returned.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON ，则启用Drupal / MySQL / InnoDB错误＃282555的解决方法。这是一个错误，在某些情况下，当在 DEFAULT 值插入AUTO_INCREMENT列时，可能会返回重复的键错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, the default, the innodb_io_capacity setting is ignored for I/O bursts occuring at checkpoints.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON ，则为默认值，对于在检查点发生的I / O突发，将忽略innodb_io_capacity设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, the default, the slave count (recorded by Rpl_semi_sync_master_clients) may drop to zero, and the master will still wait for the timeout period. If set to OFF, the master will revert to asynchronous replication as soon as the slave count drops to zero.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON （默认值），则从属计数（由Rpl_semi_sync_master_clients记录）可能降至零，并且主控仍将等待超时时间。如果设置为 OFF ，则主服务器将在从机计数降至零后立即恢复到异步复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, then new InnoDB tables are created with their own InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces. If set to OFF, then new tables are created in the InnoDB system tablespace instead. Page compression is only available with file-per-table tablespaces. Note that this value is also used when a table is re-created with an ALTER TABLE which requires a table copy.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 ON ，那么将使用它们自己的InnoDB每表文件表空间创建新的InnoDB表。如果设置为 OFF ，那么将在InnoDB系统表空间中创建新表。页面压缩仅适用于每表文件表空间。请注意，当使用需要表副本的ALTER TABLE重新创建表时，也会使用此值。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to linear, the default, XtraDB/InnoDB will automatically fetch remaining pages if there are enough within the same extent that can be accessed sequentially. If set to none, read-ahead is disabled. random has been removed and is now ignored, while both sets to both linear and random. Also see innodb_read_ahead_threshold for more control on read-aheads. Removed in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 and replaced by MySQL 5.6's innodb_random_read_ahead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 linear ，则默认为XtraDB / InnoDB，如果在相同范围内有足够的数量可以依次访问，则XtraDB / InnoDB将自动获取其余页面。如果设置为 none ，则禁用预读。 random 已被删除，现在被忽略，而 both 设置为 linear 和 random 。另请参阅innodb_read_ahead_threshold以获取更多有关预读的控制。在MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，并由MySQL 5.6的innodb_random_read_ahead代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to on (the default), optimization is enabled. Only really useful to change for benchmarking.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 on （默认值），则启用优化。更改基准测试确实很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to on, (off is default), data is not actually written to the Groonga database. Only really useful to change for benchmarking.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 on ，（默认为 off ），则实际上不会将数据写入Groonga数据库。更改基准测试确实很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to true (false is default), when there are primary component conficts, the most recent component will override the older.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 true （默认为 false ），则在存在主要组件冲突时，最新的组件将覆盖较旧的组件。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to true (the default), small packets will be aggregated into one where possible.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 true （默认值），则小数据包将在可能的情况下聚合为一个。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to true (the default), the Primary Component state is stored on disk and in the case of a full cluster crash (e.g power outages), automatic recovery is then possible. Subsequent graceful full cluster restarts will require explicit bootstrapping for a new Primary Component.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为 true （默认值），则主组件状态存储在磁盘上，如果群集完全崩溃（例如，停电），则可以进行自动恢复。随后的正常完整集群重新启动将需要新的主组件的显式引导。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON (the default), the applier slave thread performs foreign key constraint checks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为ON（默认值），则应用程序从属线程执行外键约束检查。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, the applier slave thread performs secondary index uniqueness checks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为ON，则应用程序从属线程将执行辅助索引唯一性检查。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to ON, the replication slave is restarted automatically, when node joins back to cluster.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为ON，则当节点重新加入群集时，复制从属会自动重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to a specific timestamp value, an implicit FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF clause will be applied to all queries. This is useful if one wants to do many queries for history at the specific point in time. Set it to DEFAULT to restore the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为特定的时间戳记值，则隐式的 FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF 子句将应用于所有查询。如果要在特定时间点对历史记录进行多次查询，这将很有用。将其设置为 DEFAULT 以恢复默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to a value greater than zero (the default), debug statistics about SST flow control will be posted each time after the specified number of writesets.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为大于零的值（缺省值），则在指定数量的写集之后，每次都会发布有关SST流控制的调试统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to an index name, will optimize that single index in a table. Empty by default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为索引名称，将优化表中的单个索引。默认为空。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set to more than 1, the default, MyISAM table indexes each have their own thread during repair and sorting. Increasing from the default will usually result in faster repair, but will use more CPU and memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置为大于 1 ，则默认情况下，MyISAM表索引在修复和排序过程中每个都有自己的线程。从默认值增加通常会加快修复速度，但会占用更多的CPU和内存。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set when a transaction is written to the binlog, parallel apply of that transaction will be avoided on a slave where slave_parallel_mode is not aggressive. Can be used to avoid unnecessary rollback and retry for transactions that are likely to cause a conflict if replicated in parallel. See parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果在将事务写入二进制日志时设置，则将避免在slave_parallel_mode不 aggressive 的从属服务器上并行应用该事务。可用于避免不必要的回滚和重试如果并行复制可能会引起冲突的事务。请参阅并行复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set, replication errors are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置，将忽略复制错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set, slave is not autostarted.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置，从站不会自动启动。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set, the specified type of statements (slave or stored procedure statements) will not be logged to the general log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置，则指定类型的语句（从属或存储过程语句）将不会记录到常规日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set, the specified type of statements will not be logged to the slow query log. See also log_slow_admin_statements and log_slow_filter.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置，则指定类型的语句将不会记录到慢查询日志中。另请参见log_slow_admin_statements和log_slow_filter。

trans-unit.source: Description: If set, then this restricts audit logging to certain event types. If not set, then every event type is logged to the audit log. For example: SET GLOBAL server_audit_events='connect, query'
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置，则将审核日志记录限制为某些事件类型。如果未设置，则将每种事件类型记录到审核日志中。例如：SET GLOBAL server_audit_events ='connect，query'

trans-unit.source: Description: If something went wrong with the logging here you can see the message.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果此处的日志记录出现问题，则可以看到该消息。

trans-unit.source: Description: If statement profiling is available, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO. See SHOW PROFILES() and SHOW PROFILE().
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果语句分析可用，将设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。请参阅SHOW PROFILES（）和SHOW PROFILE（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the binary log exceeds this size after a write, the server rotates it by closing it and opening a new binary log. Single transactions will always be stored in the same binary log, so the server will wait for open transactions to complete before rotating. This figure also applies to the size of relay logs if max_relay_log_size is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果二进制日志在写入后超出此大小，则服务器会通过关闭它并打开新的二进制日志来旋转它。单个事务将始终存储在同一二进制日志中，因此服务器将等待未完成的事务在轮换之前完成。如果将max_relay_log_size设置为零，此图也适用于中继日志的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the binary log is active, this variable determines the size in bytes of the cache holding a record of binary log changes outside of a transaction. The variable binlog_cache_size, determines the cache size for binary log statements inside a transaction. The binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use and binlog_stmt_cache_useserver status variables will indicate whether this variable needs to be increased (you want a low ratio of binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use to binlog_stmt_cache_use).
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果二进制日志处于活动状态，则此变量确定保存事务外部二进制日志更改记录的高速缓存的大小（以字节为单位）。变量binlog_cache_size，确定事务中二进制日志语句的缓存大小。该binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use和binlog_stmt_cache_use 服务器状态变量将显示这个变量是否需要增加（您想binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use到binlog_stmt_cache_use低比率）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the binary log is active, this variable determines the size in bytes, per-connection, of the cache holding a record of binary log changes during a transaction. A separate variable, binlog_stmt_cache_size, sets the upper limit for the statement cache. The binlog_cache_disk_use and binlog_cache_useserver status variables will indicate whether this variable needs to be increased (you want a low ratio of binlog_cache_disk_use to binlog_cache_use).
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果二进制日志处于活动状态，则此变量确定在每次事务中保存二进制日志更改记录的缓存的每个连接的字节大小。单独的变量binlog_stmt_cache_size设置了语句缓存的上限。该binlog_cache_disk_use和binlog_cache_use 服务器状态变量将显示这个变量是否需要增加（您想binlog_cache_disk_use到binlog_cache_use低比率）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the auditing is actually working. It gets the ON value when the logging is successfully started. Then it can get the OFF value if the logging was stopped or log records can't be properly stored due to file or syslog errors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果审核实际上在进行。成功启动日志记录后，它将获得ON值。如果由于文件或系统日志错误而停止了日志记录或无法正确存储日志记录，则可以获取OFF值。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the crypt() system call is available this variable will be set to YES, otherwise it will be set to NO. If set to NO, the ENCRYPT() function cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果crypt（）系统调用可用，则此变量将设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。如果设置为 NO ，则不能使用ENCRYPT（）函数。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the recv queue exceeds this many writesets, replication is paused. Can increase greatly in master-slave setups. Replication will resume again according to the gcs.fc_factor setting.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果recv队列超过了这么多的写集，复制将暂停。在主从设置中可以大大增加。复制将根据gcs.fc_factor设置再次恢复。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports CSV tables, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO. Removed in MariaDB 10.0, use the Information Schema PLUGINS table or SHOW ENGINES instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果服务器支持CSV表，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。在MariaDB 10.0中已删除，请改用Information Schema PLUGINS表或SHOW ENGINES。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports InnoDB tables, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO. Removed in MariaDB 10.0, use the Information Schema PLUGINS table or SHOW ENGINES instead.
trans-unit.target: 描述：如果服务器支持InnoDB表，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。在MariaDB 10.0中已删除，请改用Information Schema PLUGINS表或SHOW ENGINES。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports NDBCluster (disabled in MariaDB).
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否支持NDBCluster（在MariaDB中禁用）。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports dynamic loading of plugins, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO.
trans-unit.target: 描述：如果服务器支持插件的动态加载，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports partitioning, will be set to YES, unless the --skip-partition option is used, in which case will be set to DISABLED. Will be set to NO otherwise. Removed in MariaDB 10.0 - SHOW PLUGINS should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果服务器支持分区，则将其设置为 YES ，除非使用 --skip-partition 选项，否则将设置为 DISABLED 。否则将设置为 NO 。在MariaDB 10.0中已删除- 应该改用SHOW PLUGINS。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports spatial data types, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果服务器支持空间数据类型，将设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the server supports the query cache, will be set to YES, otherwise will be set to NO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果服务器支持查询缓存，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。

trans-unit.source: Description: If the zlib compression library is accessible to the server, this will be set to YES, otherwise it will be NO. The COMPRESS() and UNCOMPRESS() functions will only be available if set to YES.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果服务器可以访问zlib压缩库，则将其设置为 YES ，否则将设置为 NO 。仅当设置为 YES 时，COMPRESS（）和UNCOMPRESS（）函数才可用。

trans-unit.source: Description: If this percentage of the filesystem is not free, inserts will be prohibited. Recommended value is half the size of the available memory. Once disabled, inserts will be re-enabled once twice the reserve is available. TokuDB will freeze entirely if the disk becomes entirely full.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果该百分比的文件系统不是空闲的，则将禁止插入。推荐值是可用内存大小的一半。禁用后，一旦有两次可用的保留，插入将被重新启用。如果磁盘已满，TokuDB将完全冻结。

trans-unit.source: Description: If this system variable is set to 1, then temporary tables will be saved to disk intead of memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果将此系统变量设置为1，则临时表将保存到内存的磁盘中。

trans-unit.source: Description: If this system variable is set, then some kinds of external table locks will be disabled for some storage engines.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果设置了此系统变量，那么将对某些存储引擎禁用某些类型的外部表锁。

trans-unit.source: Description: Ignore wrong enums values in command line arguments. Useful only for test scripts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：忽略命令行参数中错误的枚举值。仅对测试脚本有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Immediately records pages stored in the buffer pool. The related innodb_buffer_pool_load_now does the reverse, and will immediately warm up the buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 说明：立即记录存储在缓冲池中的页面。相关的innodb_buffer_pool_load_now进行相反的操作，并将立即预热缓冲池。

trans-unit.source: Description: Immediately warms up the buffer pool by loading the stored data pages. The related innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now does the reverse, and immediately records pages stored in the buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过加载存储的数据页立即预热缓冲池。相关的innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now进行相反的操作，并立即记录存储在缓冲池中的页面。

trans-unit.source: Description: Implement atomic writes on supported SSD devices. See atomic write support for other variables affected when this is set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在支持的SSD设备上实现原子写入。设置此设置后，请参见对其他受影响的变量的原子写支持。

trans-unit.source: Description: Implements a more CPU efficient XtraDB checksum algorithm, useful for write-heavy loads with high I/O. If set to 1 on a server with tables that have been created with it set to 0, reads will be slower, so tables should be recreated (dumped and reloaded). XtraDB will fail to start if set to 0 and there are tables created while set to 1. Replaced with innodb_checksum_algorithm in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 描述：实现更高效的XtraDB校验和算法，对具有高I / O的写繁重负载很有用。如果在已将表创建为 0 的服务器上将其设置为 1 ，则读取速度会变慢，因此应重新创建表（转储并重新加载）。如果将XtraDB设置为 0 ,并且在设置为 1 时创建了表，则XtraDB将无法启动。在MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6 中用innodb_checksum_algorithm代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: In multi-source replication, specifies which connection will be used for commands and variables if you don't specify a connection.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在多源复制中，如果您未指定连接，则指定将哪个连接用于命令和变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: In MariaDB 5.3, enables/disables the binlog checksums. Since MariaDB 5.5, specifies the type of BINLOG_CHECKSUM_ALG for log events in the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在MariaDB 5.3中，启用/禁用binlog校验和。从MariaDB 5.5开始，为二进制日志中的日志事件指定BINLOG_CHECKSUM_ALG的类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: In MariaDB, the fatal semaphore timeout is configurable. This variable sets the maximum number of seconds for semaphores to time out in InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在MariaDB中，致命信号量超时是可配置的。此变量设置信号量在InnoDB中超时的最大秒数。

trans-unit.source: Description: In addition to the default option groups, also read option groups with the given suffix.
trans-unit.target: 说明：除了默认选项组外，还读取带有给定后缀的选项组。

trans-unit.source: Description: In replication, if set to 1, do not skip events having our server id. Default value is 0 (to break infinite loops in circular replication). Can't be set to 1 if log-slave-updates is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在复制中，如果设置为1，请不要跳过具有我们服务器ID的事件。默认值为0（以打破循环复制中的无限循环）。如果使用log-slave-updates，则不能设置为1 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Include checksums when writing index/table records.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写索引/表记录时包括校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Include delete marked records when calculating persistent statistics.
trans-unit.target: 说明：计算永久统计信息时包括删除标记的记录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented each time field data is compressed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每次压缩字段数据时递增。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented each time field data is decompressed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每次对字段数据进行解压缩时递增。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented each time the 'fast ORDER BY LIMIT feature' is used. Can be used to check if the feature is working after enabling it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每次使用“快速订购限制”功能时都会增加。启用后可用于检查该功能是否正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented each time the 'fast line count feature' is used. Can be used to check if the feature is working after enabling it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每次使用“快速行数功能”时都会增加。启用后可用于检查该功能是否正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented for each call to the external_lock() function, which generally occurs at the beginning and end of access to a table instance.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每次对external_lock（）函数的调用都增加，通常在访问表实例的开始和结束时发生。

trans-unit.source: Description: Incremented when avoiding reading a record via a keyread. This indicates lookups that were performed via a secondary index containing a field that is only a prefix of the VARCHAR column, and that could return all requested fields directly from the secondary index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：避免通过按键读取读取记录时增加。这表示通过辅助索引执行的查找包含一个字段，该字段只是VARCHAR列的前缀，并且可以直接从该辅助索引返回所有请求的字段。

trans-unit.source: Description: Indexes cardinality statistics in the background. Disable when the spider_crd_mode system variable is set to 3 or when the spider_crd_interval variable is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在后台索引基数统计信息。当 spider_crd_mode 系统变量设置为 3 或 spider_crd_interval 变量设置为 0 时，禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: Indicates the size of memory page if large page support (Linux only) is enabled. The page size is determined from the Hugepagesize setting in /proc/meminfo. See large_pages.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果启用了大页面支持（仅Linux），则指示内存页面的大小。页面大小由 /proc/meminfo 中的Hugepagesize设置确定。参见large_pages。

trans-unit.source: Description: Indicates whether --memlock was used to lock mysqld in memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指示是否使用--memlock锁定内存中的mysqld。

trans-unit.source: Description: Indicates whether large page support (Linux only - called huge pages) is used. This is set with --large-pages or disabled with --skip-large-pages. Large pages are used for the innodb buffer pool and for online DDL (of size 3* innodb_sort_buffer_size (or 6 when encryption is used)). To use large pages, the Linux sysctl variable kernel.shmmax must be large than the llocation. Also the sysctl variable vm.nr_hugepages multipled by large-page) must be larger than the usage. The ulimit for locked memory must be sufficient to cover the amount used (ulimit -l and equalivent in /etc/security/limits.conf / or in systemd LimitMEMLOCK). If these operating system controls or insufficient free huge pages are available, the allocation of large pages will fall back to conventional memory allocation and a warning will appear in the logs. Only allocations of the default Hugepagesize currently occur (see /proc/meminfo).
trans-unit.target: 描述：指示是否使用大页面支持（仅Linux-称为大页面）。这是通过 --large-pages 设置的，或者通过 --skip-large-pages 禁用的。大页面用于innodb缓冲池和在线DDL（大小为3 * innodb_sort_buffer_size（或6，使用加密时））。要使用大页面，Linux sysctl 变量 kernel.shmmax 必须大于所分配的位置。另外， sysctl 的变量 vm.nr_hugepages 通过multipled 大页）必须比使用大。锁定内存的ulimit必须足以覆盖已使用的数量（ ulimit -l 并在/etc/security/limits.conf中或在systemd LimitMEMLOCK中进行均等。如果这些操作系统控件或可用的免费大页面不足，则大页面的分配将退回到常规内存分配，并且警告将出现在日志中。当前仅发生默认 Hugepagesize 的分配（请参阅 /proc/meminfo ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Individual InnoDB data files, paths and sizes. The value of innodb_data_home_dir is joined to each path specified by innodb_data_file_path to get the full directory path. If innodb_data_home_dir is an empty string, absolute paths can be specified here. A file size is specified with K for kilobytes, M for megabytes and G for gigabytes, and whether or not to autoextend the data file is also specified.
trans-unit.target: 说明：单个InnoDB数据文件，路径和大小。将innodb_data_home_dir的值连接到innodb_data_file_path指定的每个路径，以获取完整的目录路径。如果innodb_data_home_dir为空字符串，则可以在此处指定绝对路径。文件大小指定为K（千字节），M（兆字节）和G（千兆字节），并且还指定是否自动扩展数据文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Initial size of a memory pool available to each transaction for various memory allocations. If the memory pool is not large enough for an allocation, it is increased by transaction_alloc_block_size bytes, and truncated back to transaction_prealloc_size bytes when the transaction is completed. If set large enough to contain all statements in a transaction, extra malloc() calls are avoided.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个事务可用于各种内存分配的内存池的初始大小。如果内存池不足以进行分配，则将其增加transaction_alloc_block_size字节，并在事务完成时将其截短为transaction_prealloc_size字节。如果设置足够大以包含事务中的所有语句，则可以避免额外的malloc（）调用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Initial size of the local SQL buffer.
trans-unit.target: 说明：本地SQL缓冲区的初始大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: InnoDB buffer pool size in bytes. The primary value to adjust on a database server with entirely/primarily XtraDB/InnoDB tables, can be set up to 80% of the total memory in these environments. If set to 2 GB or more, you will probably want to adjust innodb_buffer_pool_instances as well. See the XtraDB/InnoDB Buffer Pool for more on setting this variable, and also Setting Innodb Buffer Pool Size Dynamically if doing so dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 说明： InnoDB缓冲池大小（以字节为单位）。在这些环境中，可以在具有完全/主要XtraDB / InnoDB表的数据库服务器上调整的主要值可以设置为总内存的80％。如果设置为2 GB或更大，您可能还需要调整innodb_buffer_pool_instances。有关设置此变量的更多信息，请参见XtraDB / InnoDB缓冲池；如果动态设置，请参见动态设置Innodb缓冲池大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: InnoDB usually rolls back the last statement of a transaction that's been timed out (see innodb_lock_wait_timeout). If innodb_rollback_on_timeout is set to 1 (0 is default), InnoDB will roll back the entire transaction. Before MariaDB 5.5, rolling back the entire transaction was the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 说明： InnoDB通常回滚已超时的事务的最后一条语句（请参阅innodb_lock_wait_timeout）。如果将innodb_rollback_on_timeout设置为1（默认值为0），则InnoDB将回滚整个事务。在MariaDB 5.5之前，回滚整个事务是默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: InnoDB version number. From MariaDB 10.3.7, as the InnoDB implementation in MariaDB has diverged from MySQL, the MariaDB version is instead reported. For example, the InnoDB version reported in MariaDB 10.1 (which is based on MySQL 5.6) included encryption and variable-size page compression before MySQL 5.7 introduced them. MariaDB 10.2 (based on MySQL 5.7) introduced persistent AUTO_INCREMENT (MDEV-6076) in a GA release before MySQL 8.0. MariaDB 10.3 (based on MySQL 5.7) introduced instant ADD COLUMN (MDEV-11369) before MySQL.
trans-unit.target: 说明： InnoDB版本号。从MariaDB 10.3.7开始，由于MariaDB中的InnoDB实现已脱离MySQL，因此改为报告MariaDB版本。例如，MariaDB 10.1中报告的InnoDB版本（基于MySQL 5.6）在MySQL 5.7引入加密和可变大小页面压缩之前就已经对其进行了加密。MariaDB 10.2（基于MySQL 5.7）在MySQL 8.0之前的GA发行版中引入了持久性AUTO_INCREMENT（MDEV-6076）。MariaDB 10.3（基于MySQL 5.7）在MySQL之前引入了即时ADD COLUMN（MDEV-11369）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Internal Galera Cluster FSM state number.
trans-unit.target: 说明：内部Galera群集FSM状态号。

trans-unit.source: Description: Internal action to perform when multi-split reads are disabled. If the spider_multi_split_read system variable is set to 0, Spider uses this variable to determine how to handle statements when the optimizer resolves range retrieval to multiple conditions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁用多拆分读取时执行的内部操作。如果将 spider_multi_split_read 系统变量设置为 0 ，则当优化程序将范围检索解析为多个条件时，Spider将使用此变量来确定如何处理语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval between Aria group commits in microseconds (1/1000000 second) for other threads to come and do a commit in "hard" mode and sync()/commit at all in "soft" mode. Option only has effect if aria_group_commit is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：Aria组之间的提交间隔（以毫秒为单位）（1/1000000秒），以便其他线程在“硬”模式下进行提交，而在“软”模式下完全进行sync（）/ commit。该选项仅在使用aria_group_commit时有效。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in microseconds for connection failure due to too many connection processes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于连接过程过多而导致连接失败的时间间隔（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in milliseconds between bulk inserts at copying.
trans-unit.target: 说明：复制时批量插入之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in seconds between automatic checkpoints. 0 means 'no automatic checkpoints' which makes sense only for testing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自动检查点之间的间隔（以秒为单位）。0表示“无自动检查点”，仅对测试有意义。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in seconds for the slave SQL thread to retry a failed transaction due to a deadlock, elapsed lock wait timeout or an error listed in slave_transaction_retry_errors. The interval is calculated as max(slave_transaction_retry_interval, min(retry_count, 5)).
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于死锁，经过的锁等待超时或slave_transaction_retry_errors中列出的错误，从属SQL线程重试失败的事务的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。间隔计算为 max(slave_transaction_retry_interval, min(retry_count, 5)) 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in seconds that tables are closed to synchronize (flush) data to disk and free up resources. If set to 0, the default, there is no automatic synchronizing tables and closing of tables. This option should not be necessary on systems with sufficient resources.
trans-unit.target: 说明：关闭表的间隔（以秒为单位），以将数据同步（刷新）到磁盘并释放资源。如果设置为0（默认值），则不会自动同步表和关闭表。在具有足够资源的系统上，该选项不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in seconds to write and flush the InnoDB redo log. Before MariaDB 10, this was fixed at one second, which is still the default, but this can now be changed. It's usually increased to reduce flushing and avoid impacting performance of binary log group commit.
trans-unit.target: 描述：以秒为单位的时间间隔，以写入和刷新InnoDB重做日志。在MariaDB 10之前，此时间固定为一秒，这仍然是默认值，但是现在可以更改。通常会增加它，以减少刷新并避免影响二进制日志组提交的性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval in seconds where the same error code is returned if table initialization fails. Use to protect against infinite loops in table links.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果表初始化失败，返回相同错误代码的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。用于防止表链接中的无限循环。

trans-unit.source: Description: Interval of background monitoring in microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：背景监视的间隔（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Introduced to address remaining incompatibilities between PCRE and the old regex library. Accepts a comma-separated list of zero or more of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 说明：旨在解决PCRE与旧正则表达式库之间仍然存在的不兼容性。接受以逗号分隔的零个或多个以下值的列表：

trans-unit.source: Description: Java class path
trans-unit.target: 说明： Java类路径

trans-unit.source: Description: Java wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Java包装器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Kind of background monitoring to use.
trans-unit.target: 描述：要使用的一种后台监视。

trans-unit.source: Description: Kind of monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一种监视。

trans-unit.source: Description: Last valid date for the TLS certificate.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TLS证书的最后有效日期。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit for Aria transaction log size
trans-unit.target: 说明： Aria事务日志大小限制

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit in bytes of the InnoDB FULLTEXT index query result cache per fulltext query. The latter stages of the full-text search are handled in memory, and limiting this prevents excess memory usage. If the limit is exceeded, the query returns an error.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个全文查询的InnoDB FULLTEXT索引查询结果缓存的字节数限制。全文搜索的后续阶段在内存中进行处理，并且限制这样做可以防止过多的内存使用。如果超出限制，查询将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit in bytes of the changed page bitmap files. For faster incremental backup with Xtrabackup, XtraDB tracks pages with changes written to them according to the XtraDB redo log and writes the information to special changed page bitmap files. These files are rotated when the server restarts or when this limit is reached. XtraDB only. See also innodb_track_changed_pages and innodb_max_changed_pages.
trans-unit.target: 说明：更改后的页面位图文件的字节数限制。为了使用Xtrabackup更快地进行增量备份，XtraDB会根据XtraDB重做日志来跟踪已写入更改的页面，并将信息写入更改后的特殊页面位图文件。当服务器重新启动或达到此限制时，这些文件将轮换。仅XtraDB。另请参见innodb_track_changed_pa​​ges和innodb_max_changed_pa​​ges。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit on I/O activity for XtraDB/InnoDB background tasks, including merging data from the insert buffer and flushing pages. Should be set to around the number of I/O operations per second that system can handle, based on the type of drive/s being used. You can also set it higher when the server starts to help with the extra workload at that time, and then reduce for normal use. Ideally, opt for a lower setting, as at higher value data is removed from the buffers too quickly, reducing the effectiveness of caching. See also innodb_flush_sync.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制XtraDB / InnoDB后台任务的I / O活动，包括合并来自插入缓冲区和刷新页面的数据。应根据所使用的驱动器类型，将其设置为系统每秒可以处理的I / O操作数。您也可以在服务器开始帮助当时的额外工作量时将其设置为更高，然后减少以进行正常使用。理想情况下，选择较低的设置，因为在较高的值下，数据会过快地从缓冲区中删除，从而降低了缓存的效率。另请参见innodb_flush_sync。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit on the length of the query string in a record.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对记录中查询字符串长度的限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit to the number of stored routines held in the stored procedures and stored functions caches. Each time a stored routine is executed, this limit is first checked, and if the number held in the cache exceeds this, that cache is flushed and memory freed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制存储在存储过程和存储函数高速缓存中的存储例程的数量。每次执行存储的例程时，都会首先检查此限制，并且如果高速缓存中保留的数量超过此限制，则将刷新该高速缓存并释放内存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit to the number of changed page bitmap files (stored in the Information Schema INNODB_CHANGED_PAGES table). Zero is unlimited. See innodb_max_bitmap_file_size and innodb_track_changed_pages. Previously named innodb_changed_pages_limit. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述：限制已更改页面位图文件的数量（存储在Information Schema INNODB_CHANGED_PAGES表中）。零是无限的。参见innodb_max_bitmap_file_size和innodb_track_changed_pa​​ges。以前命名为 innodb_changed_pages_limit 。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit to the number of successive failed connects from a host before the host is blocked from making further connections. The count for a host is reset to zero if they successfully connect. To unblock, flush the host cache with a FLUSH HOSTS statement or mysqladmin flush-hosts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在阻止主机进行进一步的连接之前，限制主机连续失败的连接数。如果主机成功连接，则其计数将重置为零。要取消阻止，请使用FLUSH HOSTS语句或mysqladmin flush-hosts刷新主机缓存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit to the number of transaction threads that can can commit simultaneously. 0, the default, imposes no limit. While you can change from one positive limit to another at runtime, you cannot set this variable to 0, or change it from 0, while the server is running.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制可以同时提交的事务线程的数量。默认值为0，没有限制。尽管可以在运行时从一个正限值更改为另一个正限值，但是在服务器运行时，不能将此变量设置为0或将其从0更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limit used for speeding up queries listed by long nested INs. The optimizer will use existing index statistics instead of doing index dives for equality ranges if the number of equality ranges for the index is larger than or equal to this number. If set to 0 (unlimited, the default), index dives are always used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于加速由长嵌套IN列出的查询的限制。如果索引的相等范围的数目大于或等于该数目，则优化器将使用现有的索引统计信息，而不是对相等范围进行索引潜水。如果设置为 0 （无限制，默认值），则始终使用索引潜水。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limitation for reading consistent data on all backend servers when using MariaDB's internal XA implementation and START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用MariaDB的内部XA实现和 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 时读取所有后端服务器上的一致数据的限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limits the memory used while tracing a query by specifying the maximum allowed cumulated size, in bytes, of stored optimizer traces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过指定存储的优化器跟踪的最大允许累积大小（以字节为单位）来限制跟踪查询时使用的内存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limits the number of records in the monitoring table. This is only effective when Spider monitors the state of a table, which occurs when the monitoring_kind table variable is set to a value greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制监视表中的记录数。这仅在Spider监视表的状态时才有效，这是在 monitoring_kind 表变量设置为大于 1 的值时发生的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limits the number of records when acquired from a remote server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制从远程服务器获取时的记录数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Limits to the number of INSERT DELAYED threads. Once this limit is reached, the insert is handled as if there was no DELAYED attribute. If set to 0, DELAYED is ignored entirely. The session value can only be set to 0 or to the same as the global value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：限制为INSERT DELAYED线程数。一旦达到此限制，就如同没有DELAYED属性一样处理插入。如果设置为 0 ，则将完全忽略DELAYED。会话值只能设置为 0 或与全局值相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of allowed ciphers to use with TLS encryption.
trans-unit.target: 描述：与TLS加密一起使用的允许密码列表。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of operators supported by an IN BOOLEAN MODE full-text search. If you wish to change, note that each character must be ASCII and non-alphanumeric, the full string must be 14 characters and the first or second character must be a space. Positions 10, 13 and 14 are reserved for future extensions. Also, no duplicates are permitted except for the phrase quoting characters in positions 11 and 12, which may be the same.
trans-unit.target: 说明： IN BOOLEAN MODE 全文搜索支持的运算符列表。如果要更改，请注意，每个字符必须为ASCII且非字母数字，完整字符串必须为14个字符，第一个或第二个字符必须为空格。位置10、13和14保留用于将来的扩展。另外，除位置11和12处的短语引用字符可能相同以外，不允许重复。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of permitted ciphers or cipher suites to use for TLS. Besides cipher names, if MariaDB was compiled with OpenSSL, this variable could be set to "SSLv3" or "TLSv1.2" to allow all SSLv3 or all TLSv1.2 ciphers. Note that the TLSv1.3 ciphers cannot be excluded when using OpenSSL, even by using this system variable. See Using TLSv1.3 for details. This system variable implies the ssl option.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于TLS的允许密码或密码套件的列表。除了密码名称之外，如果MariaDB是使用OpenSSL编译的，则可以将此变量设置为“ SSLv3”或“ TLSv1.2”，以允许所有SSLv3或所有TLSv1.2密码。请注意，即使使用此系统变量，使用OpenSSL时也不能排除TLSv1.3密码。有关详细信息，请参见使用TLSv1.3。该系统变量暗含 ssl 选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of tables (using regex) that are excluded from the case sensitive collation enforcement.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不区分大小写的排序规则强制执行的表列表（使用正则表达式）。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of tables that will use read-free replication on the slave (i.e. not lookup a row during replication).
trans-unit.target: 说明：将在从属服务器上使用无读复制的表的列表（即在复制过程中不查找行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: List of the available TLS ciphers.
trans-unit.target: 描述：可用的TLS密码列表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Listener port for plugin.
trans-unit.target: 描述：插件的监听器端口。

trans-unit.source: Description: Lists the UUID’s of all nodes evicted from the cluster. Evicted nodes cannot rejoin the cluster until you restart their mysqld processes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：列出从群集中逐出的所有节点的UUID。退出的节点只有在重新启动其mysqld进程后才能重新加入集群。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load keys for des_encrypt() and des_encrypt from given file.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从给定文件加载des_encrypt（）和des_encrypt的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Description: Loads CRD from the system table at startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启动时从系统表加载CRD。

trans-unit.source: Description: Loads STS from the system table at startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启动时从系统表中加载STS。

trans-unit.source: Description: Local lock mode on INSERT SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 说明： INSERT SELECT 上的本地锁定模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Location of the wsrep library, usually /usr/lib/libgalera_smm.so on Debian and Ubuntu, and /usr/lib64/libgalera_smm.so on Red Hat/CentOS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该wsrep库的位置，通常 /usr/lib/libgalera_smm.so 在Debian和Ubuntu，以及 /usr/lib64/libgalera_smm.so 在Red Hat / CentOS的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Lock mysqld in memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将 mysqld锁定在内存中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Lock timeout used in Groonga.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Groonga中使用的锁定超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log slow queries to given log file. Defaults logging to hostname-slow.log
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志查询速度慢给定的日志文件。默认记录到hostname-slow.log

trans-unit.source: Description: Log all queries that have taken more than long-query-time seconds to execute to the slow query log, if active. The argument will be treated as a decimal value with microsecond precision.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将所有花费了长时间查询时间才能执行的查询记录到慢速查询日志（如果已激活）中。该参数将被视为具有微秒精度的十进制值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log results from data nodes to the Spider node in the Error Log. Performs no logging by default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将结果从数据节点记录到错误日志中的蜘蛛节点。默认情况下不执行任何日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log sequence number as shown in the LOG section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志序列号，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的LOG部分中所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log sequence number last checkpoint as shown in the LOG section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志序列号的最后一个检查点，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的LOG部分所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log slow OPTIMIZE, ANALYZE, ALTER and other administrative statements to the slow log if it is open. Before MariaDB 10.1.13, this was only available as a mysqld option, not a server variable. See also log_slow_disabled_statements and log_slow_filter.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将慢速OPTIMIZE，ANALYZE，ALTER和其他管理语句记录到慢速日志（如果已打开）。在MariaDB 10.1.13之前，只能作为mysqld选项使用，而不能用作服务器变量。另请参见log_slow_disabled_statements和log_slow_filter。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log slow statements executed by slave thread to the slow log if it is open. Before MariaDB 10.1.13, this was only available as a mysqld option, not a server variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果从属线程执行的慢速语句已打开，则将其记录到慢速日志中。在MariaDB 10.1.13之前，只能作为mysqld选项使用，而不能用作服务器变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Log some extra information to update log. Please note that this option is deprecated; see log-short-format.
trans-unit.target: 说明：记录一些其他信息以更新日志。请注意，此选项已被弃用。请参阅log-short-format。

trans-unit.source: Description: Logging queries that got snapshot conflict errors into *.err log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将具有快照冲突错误的查询记录到* .err日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Logs SQL statements with result errors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：记录带有结果错误的SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Long search depth for the two-step deadlock detection. Only used by the Aria storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 说明：两步死锁检测的搜索深度长。仅由Aria存储引擎使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Long timeout in microseconds for the two-step deadlock detection. Only used by the Aria storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 说明：两步死锁检测的超时时间（以微秒为单位）长。仅由Aria存储引擎使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Low water mark percentage of dirty pages that will enable preflushing to lower the dirty page ratio. If set to 0, the default until MariaDB 10.0.15, preflushing is disabled. This variable was changed to a double in MariaDB 10.0.15.
trans-unit.target: 说明：脏页的水印百分比低，这将使预冲洗可以降低脏页的比率。如果设置为 0 （默认值，直到MariaDB 10.0.15），则禁用预刷新。此变量在MariaDB 10.0.15中更改为双精度型。

trans-unit.source: Description: Makes it possible to disable historical "unambiguous prefix" matching in the command-line option parsing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可以在命令行选项解析中禁用历史记录的“明确前缀”匹配。

trans-unit.source: Description: Manages duplicate key check for REPLACE, INSERT IGNORE and LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE to remote servers. This can save on network roundtrips if the key always maps to a single partition. For bulk operations, records are checked for duplicate key errors one by one on the remote server, unless you set it to avoid duplicate checks on local servers (1).
trans-unit.target: 说明：管理对 REPLACE ， INSERT IGNORE 和 LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE 的重复键检查到远程服务器。如果密钥始终映射到单个分区，则可以节省网络往返次数。对于批量操作，除非在远程服务器上设置了记录以避免重复检查，否则将在远程服务器上逐一检查记录中是否存在重复的键错误（ 1 ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: MariaDB will synchronize its binary log file to disk after this many events. The default is 0, in which case the operating system handles flushing the file to disk. 1 is the safest, but slowest, choice, since the file is flushed after each write. If autocommit is enabled, there is one write per statement, otherwise there's one write per transaction. If the disk has cache backed by battery, synchronization will be fast and a more conservative number can be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB将在发生这么多事件后将其二进制日志文件同步到磁盘。默认值为0，在这种情况下，操作系统会处理将文件刷新到磁盘的操作。1是最安全但最慢的选择，因为每次写入后都会刷新文件。如果启用了自动提交，则每个语句写一次，否则每个事务写一次。如果磁盘具有由电池支持的缓存，则同步将很快，并且可以选择更保守的数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master TLS CA file. Only applies if you have enabled master-ssl.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主TLS CA文件。仅在启用了master-ssl的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master TLS CA path. Only applies if you have enabled master-ssl.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主TLS CA路径。仅在启用了master-ssl的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master TLS certificate file name. Only applies if you have enabled master-ssl.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主TLS证书文件名。仅在启用了master-ssl的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master TLS cipher. Only applies if you have enabled master-ssl.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主TLS密码。仅在启用了master-ssl的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master TLS keyfile name. Only applies if you have enabled master-ssl.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主TLS密钥文件名。仅在启用了master-ssl的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Master hostname or IP address for replication. If not set, the slave thread will not be started. Note that the setting of master-host will be ignored if there exists a valid master.info file.
trans-unit.target: 描述：要复制的主主机名或IP地址。如果未设置，则从属线程将不会启动。请注意，如果存在有效的master.info文件，则将忽略master-host的设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max checkpoint age, as shown in the LOG section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述：最大检查点寿命，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的LOG部分中所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max memory for locks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：锁的最大内存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max number of connections ever open at the same time. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：同时打开的最大连接数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max number of key cache blocks which have been used simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 说明：同时使用的最大密钥缓存块数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max number of pages used by the memory-mapped file-based transaction coordinator log. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：基于内存映射的基于文件的事务协调器日志使用的最大页面数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max number of rows for JSON aggregate functions.
trans-unit.target: 说明： JSON聚合函数的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max size for data for an internal temporary on-disk MyISAM or Aria table. These tables are created as part of complex queries when the result doesn't fit into the memory engine. You can set this variable if you want to limit the size of temporary tables created in your temporary directory tmpdir.
trans-unit.target: 说明：内部临时磁盘MyISAM或Aria表的数据的最大大小。当结果不适合存储引擎时，将这些表创建为复杂查询的一部分。如果要限制在临时目录tmpdir中创建的临时表的大小，可以设置此变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Max waiting time in seconds for Spider to get a remote connection.
trans-unit.target: 描述： Spider获得远程连接的最长时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum .ibd files MariaDB can have open at the same time. Only applies to systems with multiple XtraDB/InnoDB tablespaces, and is separate to the table cache and open_files_limit. In MariaDB 10.0 the default, if innodb_file_per_table is disabled, is 300 or the value of table_open_cache, whichever is higher. It will also auto-size up to the default value if it is set to a value less than 10.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MariaDB可以同时打开最大的.ibd文件。仅适用于具有多个XtraDB / InnoDB表空间的系统，并且与表缓存和open_files_limit分开。在MariaDB 10.0中，如果禁用了innodb_file_per_table，则默认值为300或table_open_cache的值，以较高者为准。如果将其设置为小于 10 的值，它将自动调整大小为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum delay (not strictly corresponding to a time unit) between spin lock polls. Default changed from 6 to 4 in MariaDB 10.3.5, as this was verified to give the best throughput by OLTP update index and read-write benchmarks on Intel Broadwell (2/20/40) and ARM (1/46/46).
trans-unit.target: 说明：自旋锁定轮询之间的最大延迟（不严格对应于时间单位）。默认情况下，MariaDB 10.3.5中的默认值从 6 更改为 4 ，因为已通过OLTP更新索引和Intel Broadwell（2/20/40）和ARM（1/46/46）上的读写基准进行了验证，以提供最佳吞吐量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum delay in milliseconds imposed by the innodb_max_purge_lag setting. If set to 0, the default, there is no maximum.
trans-unit.target: 说明：innodb_max_purge_lag设置施加的最大延迟（以毫秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum length considered for computing a statement digest, such as used by the Performance Schema and query rewrite plugins. Statements that differ after this many bytes produce the same digest, and are aggregated for statistics purposes. The variable is allocated per session. Increasing will allow longer statements to be distinguished from each other, but increase memory use, while decreasing will reduce memory use, but more statements may become indistinguishable.
trans-unit.target: 描述：计算语句摘要所考虑的最大长度，例如Performance Schema和查询重写插件所使用的最大长度。在这么多字节之后不同的语句产生相同的摘要，并出于统计目的进行汇总。该变量是按会话分配的。增加将允许将较长的语句彼此区分开，但是增加了内存使用量，而减少将减少内存使用量，但是更多的语句可能变得难以区分。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum length considered for digest text, when stored in performance_schema tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：摘要文本存储在performance_schema表中时考虑的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum length for a word to be included in the MyISAMfull-text index. If this variable is changed, the full-text index must be rebuilt. The quickest way to do this is by issuing a REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK statement. See innodb_ft_max_token_size for the InnoDB equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：MyISAM 全文索引中包含的单词的最大长度。如果更改此变量，则必须重建全文索引。最快的方法是发出 REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK 语句。见innodb_ft_max_token_size为InnoDB的等价物。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum length in bytes of the returned result for a GROUP_CONCAT() function.
trans-unit.target: 说明：GROUP_CONCAT（）函数的返回结果的最大长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum length of words stored in an InnoDB FULLTEXT index. A larger limit will increase the size of the index, slowing down queries, but permit longer words to be searched for. In most normal situations, longer words are unlikely search terms.
trans-unit.target: 描述：存储在InnoDB FULLTEXT索引中的单词的最大长度。较大的限制将增加索引的大小，减慢查询速度，但允许搜索更长的单词。在大多数正常情况下，较长的单词不太可能是搜索字词。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum memory in bytes that can be used for memory mapping compressed MyISAM files. Too high a value may result in swapping if there are many compressed MyISAM tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可用于内存映射压缩的MyISAM文件的最大内存（以字节为单位）。如果有很多压缩的MyISAM表，那么值太高可能导致交换。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum memory in bytes the locktree can use.
trans-unit.target: 说明：锁树可以使用的最大内存（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of columns for ORDER BY operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明： ORDER BY 操作的最大列数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of connections from Spider to a remote MariaDB servers. Defaults to 0, which is no limit.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从Spider到远程MariaDB服务器的最大连接数。默认值为 0 ，没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of data packets that can be replicated at a time. In WAN environments can be set much higher than the default, for example 512.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一次可以复制的最大数据包数。在WAN环境中，可以将其设置为比默认值高得多，例如 512 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of iterations when executing recursive queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：执行递归查询时的最大迭代次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of loaders that existed at one time.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一次存在的最大装载程序数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of locks a transaction can have.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一个事务可以拥有的最大锁数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of open tables cached in one table cache instance. See Optimizing table_open_cache for suggestions on optimizing. Increasing table_open_cache increases the number of file descriptors required.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一个表缓存实例中缓存的最大打开表数。有关优化的建议，请参见优化table_open_cache。增加table_open_cache会增加所需的文件描述符的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of packets that can be replicated at a time, Cannot be less than evs.user_send_window, which applies to data packets only. In WAN environments can be set much higher than the default, for example 512.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一次可以复制的最大数据包数，不能小于evs.user_send_window，该值仅适用于数据数据包。在WAN环境中，可以将其设置为比默认值高得多，例如 512 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of prepared statements on the server. Can help prevent certain forms of denial-of-service attacks. If set to 0, no prepared statements are permitted on the server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器上已准备好的语句的最大数目。可以帮助防止某些形式的拒绝服务攻击。如果设置为 0 ，则服务器上不允许任何准备好的语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of recent deadlocks to store.
trans-unit.target: 说明：要存储的最近死锁的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of records in a batch for bulk-load mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：批量加载模式下批处理中的最大记录数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of rows that can be returned from a SELECT query. Default is the maximum number of rows permitted per table by the server, usually 232-1 or 264-1. Can be restored to the default value after being changed by assigning it a value of DEFAULT.
trans-unit.target: 说明： SELECT查询可返回的最大行数。默认值为服务器每个表允许的最大行数，通常为2 32 -1或2 64 -1。通过将其分配为默认值可以将其恢复为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum number of rows that can be stored in the events_statements_summary_by_digest table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可以在events_statements_summary_by_digest表中存储的最大行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum of number of databases open at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 说明：同时打开的最大数据库数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum packet size in bytes for slave SQL and I/O threads. This value overrides max_allowed_packet for replication purposes. Set in multiples of 1024 (the minimum) up to 1GB
trans-unit.target: 说明：从属SQL和I / O线程的最大数据包大小（以字节为单位）。为了复制目的，此值将覆盖max_allowed_pa​​cket。设置为1024（最小）的倍数，最大为1GB

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum packet size, after which writesets become fragmented.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最大数据包大小，之后写集将变成碎片。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum percentage of unwritten (dirty) pages in the buffer pool. This variable was changed to a double in MariaDB 10.0.15.
trans-unit.target: 说明：缓冲池中未写（脏）页面的最大百分比。此变量在MariaDB 10.0.15中更改为双精度型。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum permitted number of rows per writeset. Before MariaDB Galera 10.0.27 and MariaDB 10.1.17 this variable was ignored internally and had no effect on the node. From MariaDB Galera 10.0.27 and MariaDB 10.1.17 support for this variable has been added and in order to be backward compatible the default value has been changed to 0, which essentially allows writesets to be any size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个写入集允许的最大行数。在MariaDB Galera 10.0.27和MariaDB 10.1.17之前，此变量在内部被忽略，并且对节点没有影响。从MariaDB Galera 10.0.27和MariaDB 10.1.17起，已添加了对此变量的支持，并且为了向后兼容，默认值已更改为 0 ，这实际上允许写集为任意大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum permitted size in bytes per writeset. Writesets exceeding this will be rejected. Note that versions from and before MariaDB 10.1.17 and MariaDB Galera 10.0.27 permitted the maximum to be set beyond 2GB, which was rejected by Galera.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个写入集允许的最大大小（以字节为单位）。超出此限制的Writeset将被拒绝。请注意，MariaDB 10.1.17和MariaDB Galera 10.0.27以及之前的版本允许将最大设置设置为2GB以上，这被Galera拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum search depth by the query optimizer. Smaller values lead to less time spent on execution plans, but potentially less optimal results. If set to 0, MariaDB will automatically choose a reasonable value. Since the better results from more optimal planning usually offset the longer time spent on planning, this is set as high as possible by default. 63 is a valid value, but its effects (switching to the original find_best search) are deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查询优化器的最大搜索深度。较小的值导致花费在执行计划上的时间减少，但最佳结果可能会减少。如果设置为 0 ，MariaDB将自动选择一个合理的值。由于最佳计划带来的更好结果通常会抵消较长的计划时间，因此默认情况下将其设置为尽可能高。 63 是有效值，但不建议使用其效果（切换到原始的find_best搜索）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum simultaneous connections permitted for each user account. When set to 0, there is no per user limit. From MariaDB 5.3, setting it to -1 stops users without the SUPER privilege from connecting to the server. The session variable is always read-only and only privileged users can modify user limits. The session variable defaults to the global max_user_connections variable, unless the user's specific MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS resource option is non-zero. When both global variable and the user resource option are set, the user's MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS is used. Note: This variable does not affect users with the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个用户帐户允许的最大同时连接数。设置为 0 时，没有每个用户限制。在MariaDB 5.3中，将其设置为 -1 将阻止没有 SUPER 特权的用户连接到服务器。会话变量始终是只读的，只有特权用户才能修改用户限制。会话变量默认为全局 max_user_connections 变量，除非用户的特定 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 资源选项为非零。同时设置全局变量和用户资源选项时，将使用用户的 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 。注意：此变量不会影响使用 SUPER 的用户 特权。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size for parameter values sent with mysql_stmt_send_long_data(). If not set, will default to the value of max_allowed_packet. Deprecated and removed in MariaDB 10.5.0; use max_allowed_packet instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用mysql_stmt_send_long_data（）发送的参数值的最大大小。如果未设置，则默认为max_allowed_pa​​cket的值。在MariaDB 10.5.0中已弃用并删除；请改用max_allowed_pa​​cket。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes for user-created MEMORY tables. Setting the variable while the server is active has no effect on existing tables unless they are recreated or altered. The smaller of max_heap_table_size and tmp_table_size also limits internal in-memory tables. When the maximum size is reached, any further attempts to insert data will receive a "table ... is full" error. Temporary tables created with CREATE TEMPORARY will not be converted to Aria, as occurs with internal temporary tables, but will also receive a table full error.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用户创建的MEMORY表的最大大小（以字节为单位）。在服务器处于活动状态时设置变量不会影响现有表，除非重新创建或更改它们。 max_heap_table_size和tmp_table_size中的较小者也限制了内部内存表。当达到最大大小时，任何进一步的尝试插入数据的操作都会收到“表...已满”错误。与内部临时表一样，使用CREATE TEMPORARY创建的临时表不会转换为Aria，但也会收到表已满错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes of a packet or a generated/intermediate string. The packet message buffer is initialized with the value from net_buffer_length, but can grow up to max_allowed_packet bytes. Set as large as the largest BLOB, in multiples of 1024. If this value is changed, it should be changed on the client side as well. See slave_max_allowed_packet for a specific limit for replication purposes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：数据包或生成的/中间的字符串的最大大小（以字节为单位）。数据包消息缓冲区使用net_buffer_length中的值进行初始化，但可以增长到max_allowed_pa​​cket个字节。设置为最大BLOB的最大值（1024的倍数）。如果更改此值，则也应该在客户端更改它。有关复制的特定限制，请参见slave_max_allowed_pa​​cket。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes of the insert buffer. Defaults to half the size of the buffer pool so you may want to reduce if you have a very large buffer pool. If set to 0, the insert buffer is disabled, which will cause all secondary index updates to be performed synchronously, usually at a cost to performance. This Percona XtraDB variable has not been ported to XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：插入缓冲区的最大大小（以字节为单位）。默认值为缓冲池大小的一半，因此，如果缓冲池非常大，则可能需要减小缓冲池的大小。如果设置为 0 ，则禁用插入缓冲区，这将导致所有二级索引更新同步执行，通常会降低性能。此Percona XtraDB变量尚未移植到XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes of the query buffer, By default 1024*128*10. See Block-based join algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 描述：查询缓冲区的最大大小（以字节为单位），默认为1024 * 128 * 10。请参阅基于块的连接算法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes of the temporary file used while recreating a MyISAM index. If the this size is exceeded, the slower process of using the key cache is done instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：重新创建MyISAM索引时使用的临时文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）。如果超过了此大小，则会执行使用键高速缓存的较慢过程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size in bytes used for sorting data values - anything exceeding this is ignored. The server uses only the first max_sort_length bytes of each value and ignores the rest.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于对数据值进行排序的最大大小（以字节为单位）-超出此限制的任何大小都将被忽略。服务器仅使用每个值的前 max_sort_length 个字节，而忽略其余的字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size of size of the malloc() store for setups that have spare RAM.
trans-unit.target: 说明：具有备用RAM的安装程序的malloc（）存储的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size of the XtraDB/InnoDB Change Buffer as a percentage of the total buffer pool. The default is 25%, and this can be increased up to 50% for servers with high write activity, and lowered down to 0 for servers used exclusively for reporting.
trans-unit.target: 说明：XtraDB / InnoDB更改缓冲区的最大大小占总缓冲池的百分比。默认值为25％，对于具有较高写活动的服务器，此值可以增加到50％，对于专门用于报告的服务器，该值可以降低到0。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size of the recv queue. If exceeded, the server aborts. Half of available RAM plus swap is a recommended size.
trans-unit.target: 说明： recv队列的最大大小。如果超过，服务器将中止。建议使用一半的可用RAM加交换空间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum size of write batch in bytes. 0 means no limit.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入批处理的最大大小（以字节为单位）。0表示没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum speed(KB/s) to read binlog from master
trans-unit.target: 说明：从主设备读取二进制日志的最大速度（KB / s）

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum time in microseconds to automatically adjust the innodb_thread_sleep_delay value to, based on the workload. Useful in extremely busy systems with hundreds of thousands of simultaneous connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：根据工作负载自动将innodb_thread_sleep_delay值调整为的最长时间（以微秒为单位）。在具有数十万个同时连接的极其繁忙的系统中很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum time in milliseconds spent getting an InnoDB row lock.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取InnoDB行锁所花费的最长时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum time in seconds that a query can execute before being aborted. This includes all queries, not just SELECT statements, but excludes statements in stored procedures. If set to 0, no limit is applied. See Aborting statements that take longer than a certain time to execute for details and limitations. Useful when combined with SET STATEMENT for limiting the execution times of individual queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查询被中止之前可以执行的最长时间（以秒为单位）。这不仅包括SELECT语句，还包括所有查询，但不包括存储过程中的语句。如果设置为0，则不应用限制。有关详细信息和限制，请参见中止执行时间超过一定时间的语句。与SET STATEMENT结合使用时，对限制单个查询的执行时间很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the port to become free. (Default: No wait).
trans-unit.target: 说明：等待端口空闲的最长时间（以秒为单位）。（默认：不等待）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Maximum times per second for defragmenting a single index. This controls the number of times the defragmentation thread can request X_LOCK on an index. The defragmentation thread will check whether 1/defragment_frequency (s) has passed since it last worked on this index, and put the index back in the queue if not enough time has passed. The actual frequency can only be lower than this given number. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每秒对单个索引进行碎片整理的最大时间。这控制碎片整理线程可以在索引上请求X_LOCK的次数。碎片整理线程将检查自从上次对该索引进行工作以来是否已经通过了1 / defragment_frequency，如果没有经过足够的时间，则将该索引放回队列中。实际频率只能低于此给定数字。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mechanism to lock out TokuDB checkpoints. When set to 1, TokuDB checkpoints are locked out. Setting to 0, or disconnecting the client, releases the lock.
trans-unit.target: 说明：锁定TokuDB检查点的机制。设置为 1 时，TokuDB检查点将被锁定。设置为 0 或断开客户端连接，将释放锁定。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory in bytes currently being used by the locktree.
trans-unit.target: 说明：锁定树当前正在使用的内存（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory in bytes currently used for cloned nodes. Dirty nodes are cloned before serialization/compression during checkpoint operations, after which they are written to disk and the memory freed for re-use.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前用于克隆节点的内存（以字节为单位）。在检查点操作期间进行序列化/压缩之前，将克隆脏节点，然后将它们写入磁盘，并释放内存以供重复使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory limit for each loader instance used by the TokuDB bulk loader. Memory is taken from the TokuDB cache (tokudb_cache_size), so current cache data may need to be cleared for the loader to begin. Increase if tables are very larger, with multiple secondary indexes.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TokuDB批量加载器使用的每个加载器实例的内存限制。内存是从TokuDB缓存（tokudb_cache_size）中获取的，因此可能需要清除当前缓存数据才能使加载程序开始。如果表非常大且具有多个二级索引，则增加。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory size in bytes of the locktree after most recent locktree escalation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最近一次锁树升级后，内存大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory used, in bytes, of all memtables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：所有内存表使用的内存（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Memory used, in bytes, of all unflushed memtables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：所有未刷新的内存表使用的内存（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Method used for generating checksum. Note: If Galera 25.2.x and 25.3.x are both being used in the cluster, MariaDB with Galera 25.3.x must be started with wsrep_provider_options='socket.checksum=1' in order to make it backward compatible with Galera v2. Galera wsrep providers other than 25.3.x or 25.2.x are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于生成校验和的方法。注意：如果集群中同时使用了Galera 25.2.x和25.3.x，则具有Galera 25.3.x的MariaDB必须以 wsrep_provider_options='socket.checksum=1' ，以使其与Galera v2向后兼容。不支持25.3.x或25.2.x以外的Galera wsrep提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Method used for taking the state snapshot transfer (SST). See Introduction to State Snapshot Transfers (SSTs): SST Methods for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于进行状态快照传输（SST）的方法。有关更多信息，请参见状态快照传输（SST）简介：SST方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum column data length eligible for compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：符合压缩条件的最小列数据长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum file size required for compaction_sequential_deletes.
trans-unit.target: 说明： compaction_sequential_deletes所需的最小文件大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum length for a word to be included in the MyISAMfull-text index. If this variable is changed, the full-text index must be rebuilt. The quickest way to do this is by issuing a REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK statement. See innodb_ft_min_token_size for the InnoDB equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：MyISAM 全文索引中包含的单词的最小长度。如果更改此变量，则必须重建全文索引。最快的方法是发出 REPAIR TABLE table_name QUICK 语句。请参阅innodb_ft_min_token_size以获取等效的InnoDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum length of sql statement (in statement mode) or record (in row mode) that can be compressed. See Compressing Events to Reduce Size of the Binary Log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可以压缩的sql语句（在语句模式下）或记录（在行模式下）的最小长度。请参阅压缩事件以减小二进制日志的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum length of words stored in an InnoDB FULLTEXT index. A smaller limit will increase the size of the index, slowing down queries, but permit shorter words to be searched for. For data stored in a Chinese, Japanese or Korean character set, a value of 1 should be specified to preserve functionality.
trans-unit.target: 描述：存储在InnoDB FULLTEXT索引中的单词的最小长度。较小的限制将增加索引的大小，减慢查询速度，但允许搜索较短的单词。对于以中文，日文或韩文字符集存储的数据，应指定值1以保留功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum number of pages XtraDB/InnoDB must read from an extent of 64 before initiating an asynchronous read for the following extent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在以下范围内启动异步读取之前，XtraDB / InnoDB必须从范围64读取的最小页数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum number of threads in the thread pool. In bursty environments, after a period of inactivity, threads would normally be retired. When the next burst arrives, it would take time to reach the optimal level. Setting this value higher than the default would prevent thread retirement even if inactive.
trans-unit.target: 说明：线程池中的最小线程数。在突发性环境中，一段时间不活动之后，线程通常会退役。当下一个突发到达时，将需要一些时间才能达到最佳水平。将此值设置为高于默认值将即使不活动也将阻止线程退出。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum size in bytes of the blocks allocated for query cache results.
trans-unit.target: 说明：分配给查询缓存结果的块的最小大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Minimum size in bytes of the buffer used for queries that cannot use an index, and instead perform a full table scan. Increase to get faster full joins when adding indexes is not possible, although be aware of memory issues, since joins will always allocate the minimum size. Best left low globally and set high in sessions that require large full joins. In 64-bit platforms, Windows truncates values above 4GB to 4GB with a warning. See also Block-Based Join Algorithms - Size of Join Buffers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于不能使用索引而执行全表扫描的查询的缓冲区的最小大小（以字节为单位）。尽管要注意内存问题，但增加时可能无法在添加索引时获得更快的完全联接，因为联接将始终分配最小大小。最好在全局范围内保持低位，并在需要大量完全连接的会话中设置高位。在64位平台上，Windows会在出现警告的情况下将4GB以上的值截断为4GB。另请参见基于块的联接算法-联接缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mock AWS KMS calls (for testing). Must be enabled at compile-time.
trans-unit.target: 说明：模拟AWS KMS调用（用于测试）。必须在编译时启用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode for column retrieval from remote backend server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从远程后端服务器检索列的模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode for index cardinality statistics. By default, uses SHOW at the table-level.
trans-unit.target: 说明：索引基数统计的模式。默认情况下，在表级别使用 SHOW 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode for primary key inserts using either REPLACE INTO or INSERT IGNORE on tables with no secondary index, or where all columns in the secondary index are in the primary key. For example PRIMARY KEY (a,b,c), key (b,c)
trans-unit.target: 说明：在没有二级索引的表上使用REPLACE INTO或INSERT IGNORE进行主键插入的模式，或者在二级索引中所有列都位于主键中的表上。例如 PRIMARY KEY (a,b,c), key (b,c)

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode of XA transaction register into system table.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XA事务寄存器进入系统表的方式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode used for TLS caching by the server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器用于TLS缓存的模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mode used for TLS context verification.The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于TLS上下文验证的模式。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Modes for how replication of DDL events should be executed. Legal values are STRICT and IDEMPOTENT (default). In IDEMPOTENT mode, the slave will not stop for failed DDL operations that would not cause a difference between the master and the slave. In particular CREATE TABLE is treated as CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE and DROP TABLE is treated as DROP TABLE IF EXISTS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：应该如何执行DDL事件复制的模式。合法值为 STRICT 和 IDEMPOTENT （默认值）。在 IDEMPOTENT 模式下，从设备不会因为DDL操作失败而停止，而DDL操作不会导致主设备和从设备之间出现差异。特别地，如果存在，则将CREATE TABLE视为CREATE或REPLACE TABLE，将DROP TABLE视为 DROP TABLE IF EXISTS 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mroonga log file output level, which determines what is logged. Valid levels include:
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mroonga日志文件输出级别，该级别确定要记录的内容。有效级别包括：

trans-unit.source: Description: Mroonga version
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mroonga版本

trans-unit.source: Description: Multicast packet TTL (time to live) value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：组播数据包的TTL（生存时间）值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mutex OS waits as shown in the SEMAPHORES section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mutex OS等待，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的SEMAPHORES部分所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mutex count of table lock for Spider UDFs.
trans-unit.target: 描述： Spider UDF的表锁互斥计数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mutex count of table mon for Spider UDFs.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Spider UDF的表mon的互斥计数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mutex spin rounds as shown in the SEMAPHORES section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mutex自旋回合，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的SEMAPHORES部分所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Mutex spin waits as shown in the SEMAPHORES section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mutex自旋等待，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的SEMAPHORES部分所示。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: MyISAM recovery mode. Multiple options can be selected, comma-delimited. Using no argument is equivalent to specifying DEFAULT, while specifying "" is equivalent to OFF. If enabled each time the server opens a MyISAM table, it checks whether it has been marked as crashed, or wasn't closed properly. If so, mysqld will run a check and then attempt to repair the table, writing to the error log beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MyISAM恢复模式。可以选择多个选项，以逗号分隔。不使用任何参数等效于指定 DEFAULT ，而指定“”等效于 OFF 。如果在每次服务器打开MyISAM表时启用，则它会检查它是否已标记为崩溃或未正确关闭。如果是这样，mysqld将运行检查，然后尝试修复该表，并事先写入错误日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name and location of the relay log index file, the file that keeps a list of the last relay logs. Defaults to hostname-relay-bin.index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：中继日志索引文件的名称和位置，该文件保留了最新中继日志的列表。默认为主机名 -relay-bin.index。
