trans-unit.source: Description: Name and location of the file where the MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS options (i.e. the binary log position on the master) and most other CHANGE MASTER options are written. The slave's I/O thread keeps this binary log position updated as it downloads events.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入 MASTER_LOG_FILE 和 MASTER_LOG_POS 选项（即，主数据库上的二进制日志位置）以及大多数其他 CHANGE MASTER 选项的文件的名称和位置。该从机I / O线程保持该二进制日志更新，它的下载事件位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name and location of the file where the RELAY_LOG_FILE and RELAY_LOG_POS options (i.e. the relay log position) for the CHANGE MASTER statement are written. The slave's SQL thread keeps this relay log position updated as it applies events.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入 CHANGE MASTER 语句的 RELAY_LOG_FILE 和 RELAY_LOG_POS 选项（即中继日志位置）的文件的名称和位置。该从机的SQL线程保持该中继日志更新，因为它适用的活动位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name and path of the Mroonga log file.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Mroonga日志文件的名称和路径。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of a file containing SQL statements that will be executed by the server on startup. Each statement should be on a new line, and end with a semicolon. See also init_connect.
trans-unit.target: 说明：文件名，包含将在启动时由服务器执行的SQL语句。每个语句应换行，并以分号结尾。另请参见init_connect。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of the general query log file. If this is not specified, the name is taken from the log-basename setting or from your system hostname with .log as a suffix.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通用查询日志文件的名称。如果未指定此名称，那么将从日志基名设置或系统主机名（以 .log 作为后缀）中获取名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of the slow query log file.
trans-unit.target: 说明：慢查询日志文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of the SSPI package used by server. Can be either 'Kerberos' or 'Negotiate'. Set it to 'Kerberos', to prevent less secure NTLM in domain environments, but leave it as default (Negotiate) to allow non-domain environments (e.g if server does not run in a domain environment).
trans-unit.target: 描述：服务器使用的SSPI软件包的名称。可以是“ Kerberos”或“协商”。将其设置为“ Kerberos”，以防止在域环境中使用不太安全的NTLM，但将其保留为默认值（协商），以允许非域环境（例如，如果服务器不在域环境中运行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of the service principal.
trans-unit.target: 描述：服务主体的名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Name of this node. This name can be used in wsrep_sst_donor as a preferred donor. Note that multiple nodes in a cluster can have the same name.
trans-unit.target: 描述：此节点的名称。此名称可以在wsrep_sst_donor中用作首选供体。请注意，集群中的多个节点可以具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Never fully implemented and removed in the following release.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在以下版本中，请不要完全实施和删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: No meaning.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无意义。

trans-unit.source: Description: Node weight, used for quorum calculation. See the Codership article Weighted Quorum.
trans-unit.target: 描述：节点权重，用于定额计算。请参阅编码器文章加权定额。

trans-unit.source: Description: Non-default option to alias SYSDATE() to NOW() to make it safe for replication. Since 5.0, SYSDATE() has returned a `dynamic' value different for different invocations, even within the same statement.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将SYSDATE（）别名为NOW（）的非默认选项，以确保复制安全。从5.0开始，即使在同一条语句中，SYSDATE（）也为不同的调用返回了不同的“动态”值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Non-hash searches as shown in the INSERT BUFFER AND ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. Removed in Percona's XtraDB 5.6 and replaced with the adaptive_hash_searches_btree counter in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS table in Percona 5.6 - MariaDB 10.0 has no equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：非散列搜索，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的INSERT BUFFER和ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX部分所示。在Percona的XtraDB 5.6中删除，并在Percona 5.6的INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INNODB_METRICS表中替换为adaptive_hash_searches_btree计数器-MariaDB 10.0没有等效项。

trans-unit.source: Description: Normally does not need tuning. How many old rows must accumulate in the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table before a background job will be run to delete them. Can be increased to reduce number of commits if using many different engines with gtid_pos_auto_engines, or to reduce CPU overhead if using a huge number of different gtid_domain_ids. Can be decreased to reduce number of old rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通常不需要调整。在运行后台作业删除它们之前，mysql.gtid_slave_pos表中必须累积多少个旧行。可以增加，如果使用许多不同的发动机，来降低提交的数量gtid_pos_auto_engines，或者如果使用不同数量庞大，以减少CPU开销gtid_domain_ids。可以减少以减少表中的旧行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Not set by default, but if set, UDP multicast will be used for replication. Must be identical on all nodes.For example, gmcast.mcast_addr=239.192.0.11
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认情况下未设置，但如果设置，则将使用UDP多播进行复制。在所有节点上必须相同。例如， gmcast.mcast_addr=239.192.0.11

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of .frm files that have been cached.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已缓存的.frm文件数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER DATABASE ... UPGRADE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER DATABASE ... UPGRADE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER DATABASE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER DATABASE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER EVENT commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER EVENT命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER FUNCTION commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER FUNCTION命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER PROCEDURE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER PROCEDURE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER SEQUENCE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER SEQUENCE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER SERVER commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER SERVER命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER TABLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER TABLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER TABLESPACE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER TABLESPACE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ALTER USER commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ALTER USER命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of ANALYZE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的ANALYZE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of BEGIN statements executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的BEGIN语句数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of BINLOG commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的BINLOG命令数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CALL procedure_name statements executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的CALL procedure_name语句的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CHANGE MASTER TO statements executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的CHANGE MASTER TO语句的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CHECK TABLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CHECK TABLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CHECKSUM TABLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CHECKSUM TABLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE DATABASE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE DATABASE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE EVENT commands executed. Differs from Executed_events in that it is incremented when the CREATE EVENT is run, and not when the event executes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE EVENT命令的数量。与Executed_events的不同之处在于，它在运行CREATE EVENT时（而不是在事件执行时）增加。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE UDF commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE UDF命令数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE FUNCTION commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE FUNCTION命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE INDEX commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE INDEX命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE PROCEDURE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE PROCEDURE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE ROLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE ROLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE SEQUENCE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE SEQUENCE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE SERVER commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE SERVER命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE TABLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE TABLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE TRIGGER commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE TRIGGER命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE USER commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE USER命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of CREATE VIEW commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的CREATE VIEW命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of DEALLOCATE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的DEALLOCATE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of DELETE commands executed. Differs from Handler_delete, which counts the number of times rows have been deleted from tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的DELETE命令数。与Handler_delete的区别，Handler_delete计算从表中删除行的次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of DELETEs that required a full table scan.
trans-unit.target: 说明：需要全表扫描的DELETE的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of DO commands executed.

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of FLUSH commands executed. This differs from Flush_commands, which also counts internal server flush requests.

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of FLUSH statements executed, as well as due to internal server flush requests. This differs from Com_flush, which simply counts FLUSH statements, not internal server flush operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的FLUSH语句的数量，以及由于内部服务器刷新请求而导致的数量。这不同于Com_flush，后者仅计算FLUSH语句，而不计算内部服务器的刷新操作。

trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的GET DIAGNOSTICS命令的数量。

trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的ROLLBACK命令数。与Handler_rollback不同，Handler_rollback是提供给存储引擎的事务回滚请求的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of SELECT commands executed. Since MariaDB 5.5, this also includes queries that make use of the query cache.

trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的START ALL SLAVES命令的数量。

trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的START SLAVE命令的数量。在MariaDB 10.0中已删除，请参阅Com_start_slave。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of START SLAVE commands executed. Replaces the old Com_slave_start.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的START SLAVE命令的数量。替换旧的Com_slave_start。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of STOP ALL SLAVES commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的STOP ALL SLAVES命令的数量。

trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的STOP SLAVE命令的数量。替换旧的Com_slave_stop。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of COMMIT commands executed. Differs from Handler_commit, which counts internal commit statements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的COMMIT命令数。与Handler_commit不同，后者计算内部提交语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of UNLOCK TABLES commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的UNLOCK TABLES命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRUNCATE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的TRUNCATE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of UNINSTALL PLUGIN commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的UNINSTALL PLUGIN命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of UPDATE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的UPDATE命令数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of USE database_name commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的USE database_name命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB buffer pool pages set aside for internal use.
trans-unit.target: 描述：预留给内部使用的InnoDB缓冲池页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB buffer pool pages which contain data, both dirty (modified) and clean (unmodified). See also Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_data.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB缓冲池页面的数量，其中包含脏（已修改）和干净（未修改）数据。另请参见Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_data。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB buffer pool pages which contain dirty (modified) data. See also Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty.
trans-unit.target: 描述：包含脏（已修改）数据的InnoDB缓冲池页面数。另请参见Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB buffer pool pages which have been flushed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：已刷新的InnoDB缓冲池页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of FC_PAUSE events received as well as sent since the most recent status query.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自最近状态查询以来已接收和发送的FC_PAUSE事件的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of FC_PAUSE events sent since the most recent status query
trans-unit.target: 说明：自最近状态查询以来发送的FC_PAUSE事件的数量

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of I/O threads for XtraDB/InnoDB reads. You may on rare occasions need to reduce this default on Linux systems running multiple MariaDB servers to avoid exceeding system limits.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB / InnoDB读取的I / O线程数。您可能在极少数情况下需要在运行多个MariaDB服务器的Linux系统上降低此默认设置，以避免超出系统限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of I/O threads for XtraDB/InnoDB writes. You may on rare occasions need to reduce this default on Linux systems running multiple MariaDB servers to avoid exceeding system limits.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB / InnoDB写入的I / O线程数。您可能在极少数情况下需要在运行多个MariaDB服务器的Linux系统上降低此默认设置，以避免超出系统限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB bytes read since server startup (not to be confused with Innodb_data_reads).
trans-unit.target: 说明：自服务器启动以来读取的InnoDB字节数（不要与Innodb_data_reads混淆）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB bytes written since server startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自服务器启动以来写入的InnoDB字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB fsync (sync-to-disk) calls. fsync call frequency can be influenced by the innodb_flush_method configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB fsync（同步到磁盘）调用的数量。fsync调用频率会受到innodb_flush_method配置选项的影响。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB log fsync (sync-to-disk) requests.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB日志fsync（同步到磁盘）请求的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB pages created.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建的InnoDB页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB pages read.
trans-unit.target: 描述：读取的InnoDB页数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB pages written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的InnoDB页数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB read operations (not to be confused with Innodb_data_read).
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB读取操作的数量（不要与Innodb_data_read混淆）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of InnoDB write operations.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB写操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of LOAD commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的LOAD命令数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of RocksDB MultiGet() requests made.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MultiGet() 的RocksDB MultiGet（）请求的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TLS handshakes started in client mode. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在客户端模式下启动的TLS握手次数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TLS sessions found in the session cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在会话缓存中找到的TLS会话数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TLS sessions not found in the session cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在会话缓存中找不到的TLS会话数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 16K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对16K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 1K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对1K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 2K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对2K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 32K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对32K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 4K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对4K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 512 byte block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对512字节块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of TRIM operations performed for the page-compression/NVM Compression workload for the 8K block-size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：针对8K块大小的页面压缩/ NVM压缩工作负载执行的TRIM操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of Timeout exceptions we got from Cassandra.
trans-unit.target: 说明：我们从Cassandra获得的超时异常数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of Unavailable exceptions we got from Cassandra.
trans-unit.target: 描述：我们从Cassandra获得的不可用异常的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA RECOVER statements executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的XA RECOVER语句数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA statements committed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：提交的XA语句的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA statements ended.
trans-unit.target: 描述： XA语句结束的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA statements prepared.
trans-unit.target: 描述：准备的XA语句数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA statements rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 描述： XA语句回滚的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of XA statements started.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启动的XA语句数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of [lock-tables|LOCK TABLES]] commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的[lock-tables | LOCK TABLES]]命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of aborted client connections. This can be due to the client not calling mysql_close() before exiting, the client sleeping without issuing a request to the server for more seconds than specified by wait_timeout or interactive_timeout, or by the client program ending in the midst of transferring data. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：中止的客户端连接数。这可能是由于客户端在退出前未调用mysql_close（），客户端休眠而不向服务器发出请求的时间超过了wait_timeout或Interactive_timeout所指定的秒数，或者是由于客户端程序在传输数据时结束了。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of accepted TLS handshakes. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：接受的TLS握手次数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of access denied errors.
trans-unit.target: 描述：访问被拒绝的错误数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of active instances for open tables cache lookups.
trans-unit.target: 说明：打开表缓存查找的活动实例数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of active remote servers, for use in load balancing read connections
trans-unit.target: 描述：活动的远程服务器数，用于负载平衡读取连接

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of admin commands executed. These include table dumps, change users, binary log dumps, shutdowns, pings and debugs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的管理命令数。其中包括表转储，更改用户，二进制日志转储，关闭，ping和调试。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of assign to keycache commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的分配给按键高速缓存命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of background encryption threads threads performing background key rotation and scrubbing. When setting up encryption, this variable must be set to a non-zero value. Otherwise, when you enable encryption through innodb_encrypt_tables MariaDB won't be able to automatically encrypt any unencrypted tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：执行后台密钥旋转和清理的后台加密线程的数量。设置加密时，必须将此变量设置为非零值。否则，当您通过 innodb_encrypt_tables 启用加密时，MariaDB将无法自动加密任何未加密的表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of background threads dedicated to XtraDB/InnoDB purge operations. Since MariaDB 10.0, the range has been 1 to 32. At least one background thread is always used from MariaDB 10.0. The default has been increased from 1 to 4 in MariaDB 10.2.2. Setting to a value greater than 1 creates that many separate purge threads. This can improve efficiency in some cases, such as when performing DML operations on many tables. In MariaDB 5.5, the options are 0 and 1. If set to 0, the default, purging is done with the master thread. If set to 1, purging is done on a separate thread, which could reduce contention. See also innodb_purge_batch_size.
trans-unit.target: 描述：专用于XtraDB / InnoDB清除操作的后台线程数。自MariaDB 10.0起，范围为 1 到 32 。MariaDB 10.0始终至少使用一个后台线程。在MariaDB 10.2.2中，默认值已从 1 增加到 4 。设置为大于1的值会创建许多单独的清除线程。在某些情况下，例如在许多表上执行DML操作时，这可以提高效率。在MariaDB 5.5中，选项为 0 和 1 。如果设置为 0 ，默认情况下，清除是通过主线程完成的。如果设置为 1 ，则在单独的线程上进行清除，这可以减少争用。另请参见innodb_purge_batch_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes aggressively decompressed by queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：被查询主动解压缩的地下节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes aggressively fetched from disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：主动从磁盘获取的地下节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes decompressed by a prefetch thread. See tokudb_disable_prefetching.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通过预取线程解压缩的地下节点数。参见tokudb_disable_prefetching。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes decompressed for queries
trans-unit.target: 描述：为查询解压缩的地下室节点数

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes decompressed for write operations.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为写操作解压缩的基础节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为磁盘查询而获取的地下节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes fetched for writes off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为写入磁盘而提取的地下节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of basement nodes fetched off the disk by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过预取线程从磁盘取回的基础节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of blocks added to the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：添加到块缓存中的块数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of blocks evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从缓存中逐出的块数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of blocks used by the query cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：查询缓存使用的块数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of broadcast messages injected at root.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在根处注入的广播消息数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers aggressively decompressed by queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：查询主动解压缩的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers aggressively fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为从磁盘中查询而积极获取的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers decompressed by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由预取线程解压缩的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers decompressed for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为查询解压缩的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers decompressed for writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为写操作解压缩的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers fetched for queries off the disk by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：预取线程为磁盘查询所取的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为查询磁盘而提取的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of buffers fetched for write off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为注销磁盘而提取的缓冲区数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes contained in the InnoDB buffer pool, both dirty (modified) and clean (unmodified). See also Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data, which can contain pages of different sizes in the case of compression.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB缓冲池中包含的字节数，包括脏（已修改）和干净（未修改）字节。另请参见Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data，在压缩的情况下可以包含不同大小的页面。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes of pivot nodes fetched by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由预取线程获取的枢轴节点的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes of pivot nodes fetched for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为查询获取的枢轴节点的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes of pivot nodes fetched for writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为写入而获取的枢纽节点的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes read during RocksDB MultiGet() calls.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在RocksDB MultiGet() 调用期间读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes read during compaction.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩期间读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes saved by page compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：页面压缩保存的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes that the transaction log has to grow between checkpoints before a new checkpoint is written to the log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在将新的检查点写入日志之前，事务日志必须在检查点之间增加的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes used for a histogram. If set to 0, no histograms are created by ANALYZE.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于直方图的字节数。如果设置为0，则ANALYZE不会创建直方图。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes written during compaction.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩期间写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes written during flush.
trans-unit.target: 说明：刷新期间写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes written to WAL.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入WAL的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of bytes written to the InnoDB log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写入InnoDB日志的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of calls to the GetUpdatesSince function. You may find this useful when monitoring refreshes of the transaction log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：调用 GetUpdatesSince 函数的次数。在监视事务日志的刷新时，您可能会发现这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of cleaner operations performed each cleaner period.
trans-unit.target: 描述：每个清洁阶段执行的清洁操作次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of client connections that are actively running a command, and not just sleeping while waiting to receive the next command to execute. Some internal system threads also count towards this status variable if they would show up in the output of the SHOW PROCESSLIST statement.
trans-unit.target: 描述：正在主动运行命令，而不仅仅是在等待接收下一个要执行的命令时处于睡眠状态的客户端连接数。如果某些内部系统线程将出现在 SHOW PROCESSLIST 语句的输出中，则也计入此状态变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of clients connected to the server. See Handling Too Many Connections. The Threads_connected name is inaccurate when the thread pool is in use, since each client connection does not correspond to a dedicated thread in that case.
trans-unit.target: 描述：连接到服务器的客户端数量。请参阅处理连接过多。该 Threads_connected 时候名称是不准确的线程池在使用中，因为每个客户端连接不符合在这种情况下专用线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of column permissions granted (rows in the mysql.columns_priv table).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的列权限数（在mysql.columns_priv表中的行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of commits that have been successfully acknowledged by a slave. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从站已成功确认的提交数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of commits that have not been successfully acknowledged by a slave. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从站未成功确认的提交数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of compression errors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩错误数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of condition instruments that could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法加载的条件仪器的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of connection attempts (both successful and unsuccessful)
trans-unit.target: 描述：连接尝试次数（成功和失败）

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of connection attempts that were aborted prior to authentication (regardless of whether or not an error occured).
trans-unit.target: 描述：在身份验证之前被中止的连接尝试次数（无论是否发生错误）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of connections for which connection attribute truncation has occurred. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：发生连接属性截断的连接数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of connections the libwrap library refused. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明： libwrap库拒绝的连接数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of consecutive log recovery failures after which logs will be automatically deleted to cure the problem; 0 (the default) disables the feature.
trans-unit.target: 说明：连续日志恢复失败的次数，此后将自动删除日志以解决该问题；0（默认）禁用该功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of current row locks on InnoDB tables as shown in the TRANSACTIONS section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. Renamed from InnoDB_row_lock_numbers in XtraDB 5.5.8-20.1.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB表上当前行锁的数量，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的TRANSACTIONS部分所示。在XtraDB 5.5.8-20.1。中从InnoDB_row_lock_numbers重命名。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of current row locks on InnoDB tables as shown in the TRANSACTIONS section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. Renamed to InnoDB_current_row_locks in XtraDB 5.5.10-20.1.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB表上当前行锁的数量，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的TRANSACTIONS部分所示。更名为InnoDB_current_row_locks在XtraDB 5.5.10-20.1。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of currently cached .frm files.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前缓存的.frm文件的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of currently existing loaders.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前现有的装载机数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of currently open locktrees.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当前打开的锁树的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of currently opened streams, usually log files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当前打开的流的数量，通常是日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of currently opened tables, excluding temporary tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前打开的表数，不包括临时表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of database permissions granted (rows in the mysql.db table).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的数据库权限数（mysql.db表中的行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of databases currently open.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前打开的数据库数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of days after which the binary log can be automatically removed. By default 0, or no automatic removal. When using replication, should always be set higher than the maximum lag by any slave. Removals take place when the server starts up, when the binary log is flushed, when the next binary log is created after the previous one reaches the maximum size, or when running PURGE BINARY LOGS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：可以自动删除二进制日志的天数。默认情况下为0，否则不自动删除。使用复制时，应始终将其设置为高于任何从属服务器的最大延迟。当服务器启动时，清除二进制日志时，在前一个达到最大大小后创建下一个二进制日志或运行PURGE BINARY LOGS时，都会进行删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of db_close operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明： db_close操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of db_open operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明： db_open操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of defragment failures. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：碎片整理失败的次数。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of defragment operations. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：碎片整理操作的数量。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of defragment re-compression failures. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：碎片整理重新压缩失败的次数。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of defragment stats changes there are before the stats are written to persistent storage. Defaults to zero, meaning disable defragment stats tracking. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：碎片统计数据更改的数量，在将统计数据写入持久性存储之前。默认值为零，表示禁用碎片整理统计信息跟踪。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of delete markers written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的删除标记数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of deleted records were not written to storage due to a nonexistent key.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于键不存在，未将删除的记录数写入存储中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of deserialized basement nodes where all keys had different size keys, which are not eligible for in-memory optimization.
trans-unit.target: 描述：反序列化的地下节点的数量，其中所有密钥具有不同大小的密钥，这些密钥不适合进行内存中的优化。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of deserialized basement nodes where all keys were the same size. This leaves the basement in an optimal format for in-memory workloads.
trans-unit.target: 描述：所有密钥都具有相同大小的反序列化地下室节点数。这为内存中的工作负载提供了最佳格式的地下室。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of digits to be returned after the decimal point in division operations. By default 4, so SELECT 2/15 would return 0.1333. After setting div_precision_increment to 6, for example, the same operation would return 0.133333.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在除法运算中小数点后要返回的位数。默认为 4 ，因此 SELECT 2/15 将返回0.1333。例如，将div_precision_increment设置为 6 后，相同的操作将返回0.133333。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of dirty (modified) bytes contained in the InnoDB buffer pool. See also Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty, which can contain pages of different sizes in the case of compression.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB缓冲池中包含的脏（已修改）字节数。另请参见Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty，在压缩的情况下可以包含不同大小的页面。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of entries in the XtraDB data dictionary cache. This Percona XtraDB variable was removed in MariaDB 10/XtraDB 5.6 as it was replaced with MySQL 5.6's table_definition_cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB数据字典缓存中的条目数。这个Percona XtraDB变量已在MariaDB 10 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，因为它已被MySQL 5.6的table_definition_cache实现替换。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of entries the node permits for a given delayed node before triggering the Auto Eviction protocol. An entry is added to a delayed list for each delayed response from a node. If set to 0, the default, the Auto Eviction protocol is disabled for this node.
trans-unit.target: 说明：节点在触发自动逐出协议之前允许给定延迟节点的条目数。对于来自节点的每个延迟响应，将条目添加到延迟列表。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则此节点禁用自动退出协议。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of errors during calls to select() or poll() on the listening port. The client would not necessarily have been rejected in these cases. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在侦听端口上调用select（）或poll（）时发生的错误数。在这些情况下，客户不一定会被拒绝。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of errors encountered while trying to read data from an SST file.
trans-unit.target: 描述：尝试从SST文件读取数据时遇到的错误数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of errors that occurred during calls to accept() on the listening port. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在侦听端口上调用accept（）期间发生的错误数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of errors which occurred while doing INSERT DELAYED. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行INSERT DELAYED时发生的错误数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of errors while searching for the connecting client IP address. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：搜索连接的客户端IP地址时的错误数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of events not recorded, due to either being recursive, or having a deeper nested events stack than the implementation limit. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于递归或嵌套的事件堆栈比实现限制更深而未记录的事件数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of events that a slave skips from the master. If this would cause the slave to begin in the middle of an event group, the slave will instead begin from the beginning of the next event group. See SET GLOBAL sql_slave_skip_counter.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站从主站跳过的事件数。如果这将导致从属设备从事件组的中间开始，则从属设备将从下一个事件组的开始开始。请参见SET GLOBAL sql_slave_skip_counter。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of expired rows.
trans-unit.target: 描述：过期的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of failed server connection attempts. This can be due to a client using an incorrect password, a client not having privileges to connect to a database, a connection packet not containing the correct information, or if it takes more than connect_timeout seconds to get a connect packet. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：失败的服务器连接尝试次数。这可能是由于客户端使用了错误的密码，客户端没有连接数据库的特权，连接包中未包含正确信息或获取连接包的时间超过了connect_timeout秒。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of failures encountered while performing merge operator actions.
trans-unit.target: 描述：执行合并操作员操作时遇到的故障数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of file instruments that could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法加载的文件工具数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of files the server has opened.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器已打开的文件数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of first read records to start a range scan on the backend server. Spider needs to send the first record. Fetching the second record saves network round-trips, stopping the plan if the backend has a single record. First read and second read are used to warm up for background searches, third reads without using the spider_split_read and spider_semi_split_read system variables fetches the remaining data source in a single last fetch.
trans-unit.target: 说明：首先读取的记录数，用于在后端服务器上开始范围扫描。蜘蛛需要发送第一条记录。获取第二条记录可以节省网络往返，如果后端只有一条记录，则可以停止计划。第一次读取和第二次读取用于预热后台搜索，而第三次读取而不使用 spider_split_read 和 spider_semi_split_read 系统变量将在最后一次读取中获取剩余的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of first read records to use when performing a concurrent background search. To start a range scan on the remote backend, the storage engine first needs to send the first record. Fetching a second record in the same query can save a network round trip stopping the plan if the backend has a single record. The first and second reads are used to warm up for background search. When not using spider_split_read and spider_semi_split_read, the third read fetches the remaining data source in a single fetch.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行并发后台搜索时要使用的第一条读取记录的数量。要在远程后端上开始范围扫描，存储引擎首先需要发送第一条记录。如果后端只有一条记录，则在同一查询中获取第二条记录可以节省网络往返行程，从而停止计划。第一读和第二读用于预热背景搜索。当不使用 spider_split_read 和 spider_semi_split_read 时，第三个读取将通过一次读取来获取剩余的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of free query cache memory blocks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：空闲查询高速缓存存储块的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of free InnoDB buffer pool pages.
trans-unit.target: 描述：免费的InnoDB缓冲池页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of function permissions granted (rows in the mysql.procs_priv table with a routine type of FUNCTION).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的函数权限数（在mysql.procs_priv表中的例程类型为 FUNCTION 的行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of generic SHOW commands executed, such as SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS and SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的通用SHOW命令的数量，例如SHOW INDEX_STATISTICS和SHOW TABLE_STATISTICS

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of group commit WAL file syncs have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 说明：发生了组提交WAL文件同步的次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hash buckets for open and changed files. If you have many Aria files open you should increase this for faster flushing of changes. A good value is probably 1/10th of the number of possible open Aria files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：打开和更改的文件的哈希桶数。如果您打开了许多Aria文件，则应增加此文件，以更快地刷新更改。一个好的值可能是可能打开的Aria文件数量的1/10。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hash buckets for open and changed files. If you have many MyISAM files open you should increase this for faster flushing of changes. A good value is probably 1/10th of the number of possible open MyISAM files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：打开和更改的文件的哈希桶数。如果打开了许多MyISAM文件，则应增加此文件，以更快地清除更改。一个好的值可能是打开的MyISAM文件数量的1/10。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hash buckets for open files. Default 512. If you have a lot of S3 files open you should increase this for faster flush of changes. A good value is probably 1/10 of number of possible open S3 files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：打开文件的哈希桶数。默认值512。如果打开了许多S3文件，则应增加此值以更快地清除更改。一个好的值可能是可能打开的S3文件数量的1/10。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hashes used by the set of metadata locks. The metadata locks are partitioned into separate hashes in order to reduce contention.
trans-unit.target: 说明：元数据锁集使用的哈希数。元数据锁被划分为单独的哈希，以减少争用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of heartbeats the slave has received from the master.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站从主站收到的心跳数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hits for open tables cache lookups.
trans-unit.target: 描述：打开表缓存查找的命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hits for the Block Cache index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：块缓存索引的命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hits for the compressed Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：压缩的块缓存的命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hits when accessing the data block from the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从块缓存访问数据块时的命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of hits when accessing the filter block from the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从块缓存访问过滤器块时的命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of host names that will be cached to avoid resolving. Setting to 0 disables the cache. Changing the value while the server is running causes an implicit FLUSH HOSTS, clearing the host cache and truncating the performance_schema.host_cache table. If you are connecting from a lot of different machines you should consider increasing.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将被缓存以避免解析的主机名数量。设置为 0 将禁用缓存。在服务器运行时更​​改该值将导致隐式的FLUSH HOSTS，清除主机缓存并截断Performance_schema.host_cache表。如果您从许多不同的计算机连接，则应考虑增加。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of in-memory temporary tables created.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建的内存中临时表的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of inactive threads in the thread pool. Threads become inactive for various reasons, such as by waiting for new work. However, an inactive thread is not necessarily one that has not been assigned work. Threads are also considered inactive if they are being blocked while waiting on disk I/O, or while waiting on a lock, etc.
trans-unit.target: 描述：线程池中非活动线程的数量。线程由于各种原因（例如，等待新工作）而变得不活动。但是，非活动线程不一定是尚未分配工作的线程。如果线程在等待磁盘I / O或等待锁等时被阻塞，则它们也被视为非活动线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of index pages sampled when estimating cardinality and statistics for indexed columns. Increasing this value will increases index statistics accuracy, but use more I/O resources when running ANALYZE TABLE. See InnoDB Persistent Statistics.
trans-unit.target: 描述：估计索引列的基数和统计信息时采样的索引页数。增大此值将提高索引统计信息的准确性，但是在运行ANALYZE TABLE时会使用更多的I / O资源。参见InnoDB持久统计。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of insert batches performed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行的插入批次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a condition object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建条件对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a file object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建文件对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a file object could not be opened. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法打开文件对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a mutual exclusion object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建互斥对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a read/write lock object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建读/写锁定对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a socket object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建套接字对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a table object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建表对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances a table object could not be opened. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法打开表对象的实例数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of instances thread object could not be created. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法创建实例数的线程对象。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of internal COMMIT requests. Differs from Com_commit, which counts the number of COMMIT statements executed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：内部COMMIT请求的数量。与Com_commit不同，后者计算执行的COMMIT语句的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of internal nodes processed in each cleaner thread period (see tokudb_cleaner_period). Setting to 0 turns off cleaner threads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在每个清洁器线程周期中处理的内部节点数（请参阅tokudb_cleaner_period）。设置为 0 将关闭清洁器线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of invisible columns in all opened tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：所有打开的表中的不可见列数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of iterators currently open.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前打开的迭代器数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of joins which did not use an index. If not zero, you may need to check table indexes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：不使用索引的联接数。如果不为零，则可能需要检查表索引。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of joins which used a full scan of the first table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用完整扫描第一个表的联接数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of joins which used a range on the first table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在第一个表上使用范围的联接数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of joins which used a range search of the first table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用第一个表的范围搜索的联接数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of joins without keys that check for key usage after each row. If not zero, you may need to check table indexes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：无键的联接数，每行之后检查键的用法。如果不为零，则可能需要检查表索引。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of key cache block read requests. See Optimizing key_buffer_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：键高速缓存块读取请求的数量。请参阅优化key_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of key cache block write requests
trans-unit.target: 描述：键高速缓存块写入请求的数量

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of key cache blocks in the warm list.
trans-unit.target: 描述：热列表中关键高速缓存块的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of key cache blocks which have been modified but not flushed to disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已被修改但尚未刷新到磁盘的关键高速缓存块的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys dropped during compaction due their being overwritten by new values.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩期间由于新值覆盖而丢弃的键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys dropped during compaction due to their being obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 描述：由于过时而在压缩期间丢弃的键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys dropped during compaction due to user compaction.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于用户压缩，在压缩期间丢弃的键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys have been read.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已读取键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：密钥数量已更新。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys have been written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：密钥数量已写入。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys read through RocksDB MultiGet() calls.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过RocksDB MultiGet() 调用读取的键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys we've made lookups for.
trans-unit.target: 描述：我们进行查询的键的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of keys written that are not delete, merge or put keys.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的不是删除，合并或放置键的键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：作为检查点一部分刷新到磁盘的叶节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不作为检查点一部分刷新到磁盘的叶节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of locktrees eligible for single transaction optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可用于单个事务优化的锁树数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of long checkpoint begins (checkpoint begins taking more than 1 second).
trans-unit.target: 说明：长检查点开始的数目（检查点开始花费1秒钟以上）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of membership install rounds to attempt before timing out. The total rounds will be this value plus two.
trans-unit.target: 描述：超时之前尝试进行的成员资格安装回合次数。总回合将为该值加2。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of memtable hits.
trans-unit.target: 描述：记忆命中次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of memtable misses.
trans-unit.target: 描述：易失命中次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of merge keys written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的合并键数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of merge passes performed by the sort algorithm. If too high, you may need to look at improving your query indexes, or increasing the sort_buffer_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：排序算法执行的合并次数。如果太高，则可能需要考虑改善查询索引或增加sort_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of messages ignored by a leaf because it had already been applied.
trans-unit.target: 描述：由于叶子已经被应用而被叶子忽略的消息数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of messages injected at root.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在根上注入的消息数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of misses for open tables cache lookups.
trans-unit.target: 说明：未打开表缓存查找的未命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of misses for the Block Cache index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：块高速缓存索引的未命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of misses for the compressed Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩块缓存的未命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of misses when accessing the data block from the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从块缓存访问数据块时的未命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of misses when accessing the filter block from the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从块缓存访问过滤器块时的未命中数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of multi-row queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：多行查询的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of multi-table DELETE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的多表DELETE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of multi-table UPDATE commands executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已执行的多表UPDATE命令的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of mutual exclusion instruments that could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法加载的互斥工具的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of negotiations needed to establish the TLS connection. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：建立TLS连接所需的协商次数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of negotiations needed to establish the connection to a TLS-enabled master. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：建立与启用TLS的主服务器的连接所需的协商次数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of network exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：网络异常数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of nodes currently in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 说明：集群中当前的节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of non-leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：作为检查点一部分刷新到磁盘的非叶子节点的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of non-leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 描述：不作为检查点一部分刷新到磁盘的非叶节点数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of non-transaction statement which used the regular binary log cache, being smaller than binlog_stmt_cache_size. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用常规二进制日志缓存的非事务语句的数量，小于binlog_stmt_cache_size。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of non-transaction statements which used a temporary disk cache because they could not fit in the regular binary log cache, being larger than binlog_stmt_cache_size. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用临时磁盘高速缓存的非事务语句的数量，因为它们不能容纳在常规二进制日志高速缓存中，大于binlog_stmt_cache_size。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of on-disk temporary tables created.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建的磁盘上临时表的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of open files held by InnoDB. InnoDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB拥有的打开文件数。仅限于InnoDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of overflows for open tables cache lookups.
trans-unit.target: 说明：打开表高速缓存查找的溢出次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of page cleaner threads. The default is 4, but the value will be set to the number of innodb_buffer_pool_instances if this is lower. If set to 1, only a single cleaner thread is used, as was the case until MariaDB 10.2.1. Cleaner threads flush dirty pages from the buffer pool, performing flush list and least-recently used (LRU) flushing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：页清洁器线程数。默认值为 4 ，但是如果此值较小，则将其设置为innodb_buffer_pool_instances的数量。如果设置为 1 ，则仅使用单个清理线程，就像MariaDB 10.2.1之前的情况一样。清洁程序线程从缓冲池中刷新脏页，执行刷新列表和最近最少使用（LRU）刷新。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of page encryption errors. See Table and Tablespace Encryption.
trans-unit.target: 说明：页面加密错误数。请参阅表和表空间加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages compressed with page compression that are decompressed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通过页面压缩压缩的已解压缩页面的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages considered at once when merging multiple pages to defragment. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 描述：合并多个页面进行碎片整理时立即考虑的页面数。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages page decrypted. See Table and Tablespace Encryption. Was originally named Innodb_num_pages_page_decrypted in MariaDB 10.1.3, renamed to its current name in MariaDB 10.1.4.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已解密页面的页面数。请参阅表和表空间加密。在MariaDB 10.1.3中最初命名为 Innodb_num_pages_page_decrypted ，在MariaDB 10.1.4中重命名为其当前名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages page encrypted. See Table and Tablespace Encryption. Was originally named Innodb_num_pages_page_encrypted in MariaDB 10.1.3, renamed to its current name in MariaDB 10.1.4.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已加密页面的页数。请参阅表和表空间加密。在MariaDB 10.1.3中最初命名为 Innodb_num_pages_page_encrypted ，在MariaDB 10.1.4中重命名为当前名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages read into the InnoDB buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread that were evicted without having been accessed by queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：被预读后台线程读入InnoDB缓冲池的页面数，这些页面在查询未访问的情况下被驱逐了。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages read into the InnoDB buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread.
trans-unit.target: 描述：预读后台线程读入InnoDB缓冲池的页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages that are page compressed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：页面压缩的页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pages written to the InnoDB doublewrite buffer.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写入InnoDB doublewrite缓冲区的页面数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of parallel threads used when building an InnoDB FULLTEXT index. See also innodb_sort_buffer_size.
trans-unit.target: 描述：构建InnoDB FULLTEXT索引时使用的并行线程数。另请参见innodb_sort_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending InnoDB fsync (sync-to-disk) calls. fsync call frequency can be influenced by the innodb_flush_method configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 描述：待处理的InnoDB fsync（与磁盘同步）调用的数量。fsync调用频率会受到innodb_flush_method配置选项的影响。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending InnoDB log fsync (sync-to-disk) requests.
trans-unit.target: 描述：待处理的InnoDB日志fsync（与磁盘同步）请求的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending InnoDB log writes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：待处理的InnoDB日志写入次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending InnoDB reads.
trans-unit.target: 描述：待处理的InnoDB读取次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending InnoDB writes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：待处理的InnoDB写入次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pending row locks on InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB表上的未决行锁数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of physical files in the InnoDB redo log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB重做日志中的物理文件数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of physical index block reads. See Optimizing key_buffer_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：物理索引块读取的数量。请参阅优化key_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of procedure permissions granted (rows in the mysql.procs_priv table with a routine type of PROCEDURE).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的过程权限数（在mysql.procs_priv表中的行，其例程类型为 PROCEDURE ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of proxy permissions granted (rows in the mysql.proxies_priv table).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的代理权限数（在mysql.proxies_priv表中行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of pruning operations performed to remove old results to make space for new results in the query cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：执行删除操作以删除旧结果以在查询缓存中为新结果腾出空间的次数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of put keys written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的放置键的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries currently cached by the query cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查询缓存当前缓存的查询数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries ever cached in the query cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查询缓存中曾经缓存的查询数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries returning no results. Note this is not the same as Com_empty_query.
trans-unit.target: 说明：不返回任何结果的查询数。请注意，这与Com_empty_query不同。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries that are uncacheable by the query cache, or use SQL_NO_CACHE. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查询缓存无法缓存的查询数量，或使用SQL_NO_CACHE。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries that exceeded the execution time specified by max_statement_time. See Aborting statements that take longer than a certain time to execute.
trans-unit.target: 描述：超过max_statement_time指定的执行时间的查询数。请参阅中止执行时间超过特定时间的语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries to the server that do not produce SQL queries. An SQL query simply returning no results does not increment Com_empty_query - see Empty_queries instead. An example of an empty query sent to the server is mysql --comments -e '-- sql comment'
trans-unit.target: 说明：对服务器的不产生SQL查询的查询数。仅返回任何结果的SQL查询不会增加 Com_empty_query -请参见Empty_queries。发送到服务器的空查询的一个示例是 mysql --comments -e '-- sql comment'

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries which make use of custom aggregate functions.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用自定义聚合函数的查询数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of queries which took longer than long_query_time to run. The slow query log does not need to be active for this to be recorded.
trans-unit.target: 描述：运行时间超过long_query_time的查询数。该慢查询日志不需要激活这个被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of random read-aheads.
trans-unit.target: 描述：随机预读次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of read operations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：读取操作数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of read retrys triggered by semi_consistent_read (InnoDB feature).
trans-unit.target: 描述：由semi_consistent_read（InnoDB功能）触发的读取重试次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of read-only transactions that have been started.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已启动的只读事务数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of read/write lock instruments that could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无法加载的读/写锁定工具的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of reads that could not be satisfied by the InnoDB buffer pool and had to be read from disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB缓冲池无法满足的必须从磁盘读取的读取次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of records in a page when acquired record by record.
trans-unit.target: 说明：按记录获取记录时，页面中的记录数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of records in chunk to retry the result when a range query is sent to remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将范围查询发送到远程后端服务器时重试结果的数据块中的记录数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of records of space that defragmentation should leave on the page. This variable, together with innodb_defragment_fill_factor, is introduced so defragmentation won't pack the page too full and cause page split on the next insert on every page. The variable indicating more defragmentation gain is the one effective. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：碎片整理应在页面上保留的空间记录数。此变量与innodb_defragment_fill_factor一起引入，因此进行碎片整理不会将页面打包得太满，并且不会在每个页面的下一个插入上导致页面拆分。表示更多碎片整理增益的变量是一个有效的变量。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of refused connections due to internal server errors, for example out of memory errors, or failed thread starts. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于内部服务器错误（例如内存不足错误或线程启动失败）而被拒绝的连接数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of refused connections due to the max_connections limit being reached. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：由于达到max_connections限制而被拒绝的连接数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of regular files currently opened by the server. Does not include sockets or pipes, or storage engines using internal functions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器当前打开的常规文件数。不包括使用内部功能的插座或管道或存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of replicated transactions that involved changes in multiple (transactional) storage engines, before considering the update of mysql.gtid_slave_pos. These are transactions that were already cross-engine, independent of the GTID position update introduced by replication. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在考虑更新 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 之前，涉及多个（事务性）存储引擎更改的复制事务数。这些是已经跨引擎的事务，与复制引入的GTID位置更新无关。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of replicated transactions where the update of the gtid_slave_pos table had to choose a storage engine that did not otherwise participate in the transaction. This can indicate that setting gtid_pos_auto_engines might be useful. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已复制事务的数量，其中 gtid_slave_pos 表的更新必须选择不参与该事务的存储引擎。这可以表明设置gtid_pos_auto_engines可能有用。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests served by the query cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：查询缓存服务的请求数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to delete a row based on its position.
trans-unit.target: 描述：根据行的位置删除行的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to delete a row in a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：删除临时表中的行的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read a row (excluding temporary tables).
trans-unit.target: 描述：读取行的请求数（临时表除外）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read a row based on its position. If this value is high, you may not be using joins that don't use indexes properly, or be doing many full table scans.
trans-unit.target: 描述：根据行的位置读取行的请求数。如果此值很高，则可能是您未使用未正确使用索引的联接，或者正在执行许多全表扫描。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read a row in a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：读取临时表中的行的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read from the InnoDB buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从InnoDB缓冲池读取的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read the first row from an index. A high value indicates many full index scans, e.g. SELECT a FROM table_name where a is an indexed column.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从索引读取第一行的请求数。高值表示许多全索引扫描，例如， SELECT a FROM table_name ，其中 a 是索引列。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read the last row from an index. ORDER BY DESC results in a last-key request followed by several previous-key requests.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从索引读取最后一行的请求数。ORDER BY DESC导致最后一个键请求，然后是几个先前的键请求。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read the next row from an index (in order). Increments when doing an index scan or querying an index column with a range constraint.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从索引中读取下一行的请求数（按顺序）。进行索引扫描或查询具有范围约束的索引列时的增量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read the next row. A large number of these may indicate many table scans and improperly used indexes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：读取下一行的请求数。其中大量可能表明许多表扫描和索引使用不正确。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to read the previous row from an index (in order). Mostly used with ORDER BY DESC.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从索引中读取前一行的请求数（按顺序）。通常与ORDER BY DESC一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to rollback to a transaction savepoint.
trans-unit.target: 描述：回滚到事务保存点的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to update a row in a table. Since MariaDB 5.3, this no longer counts temporary tables - see Handler_tmp_update.
trans-unit.target: 描述：更新表中一行的请求数。从MariaDB 5.3开始，它不再计入临时表-请参阅Handler_tmp_update。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to update a row to a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将行更新到临时表的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to write a block to the key cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将块写入键高速缓存的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to write a row to a table. Since MariaDB 5.3, this no longer counts temporary tables - see Handler_tmp_write.
trans-unit.target: 描述：向表写一行的请求数。从MariaDB 5.3开始，它不再计入临时表-请参阅Handler_tmp_write。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to write a row to a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将行写入临时表的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to write to the InnoDB buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写入InnoDB缓冲池的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests to write to the InnoDB redo log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：写入InnoDB重做日志的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of requests waiting for a lock to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 描述：等待授予锁的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of reseeks that have occurred inside an iteration that skipped over a large number of keys with the same user key.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在一次迭代中发生的多次搜索，这些重复跳过了使用相同用户键的大量键。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of role permissions granted (rows in the mysql.roles_mapping table).
trans-unit.target: 说明：授予的角色权限数（在mysql.roles_mapping表中行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of roles (rows in the mysql.user table where is_role='Y').
trans-unit.target: 说明：角色数（在mysql.user表中， is_role='Y' ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rotations before the log is removed. When rotated, the current log file is stored and a new, empty, log is created. Any rotations older than this setting are removed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：删除日志之前的转数。旋转后，将存储当前日志文件并创建一个新的空日志。早于该设置的所有旋转都将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of row read requests based on an index value. A high value indicates indexes are regularly being used, which is usually positive.
trans-unit.target: 描述：基于索引值的行读取请求数。较高的值表示定期使用索引，通常为正数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows actually read.
trans-unit.target: 描述：实际读取的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows contained in the events_waits_history_long table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：events_waits_history_long表中包含的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows deleted from InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从InnoDB表中删除的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows deleted from system tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从系统表中删除的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows deleted.
trans-unit.target: 说明：删除的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows in the performance_schema.accounts table. If set to 0, the Performance Schema will not store statistics in the accounts table. -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：Performance_schema.accounts表中的行数。如果设置为0，则性能架构将不会在帐户表中存储统计信息。 -1 （MariaDB 10.0.12的默认值）用于自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows in the events_stages_history_long table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：events_stages_history_long表中的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows in the events_statements_history_long table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：events_statements_history_long表中的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows in the performance_schema.users table. If set to 0, the Performance Schema will not store connection statistics in the users table. -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：Performance_schema.users表中的行数。如果设置为0，则性能架构将不会在用户表中存储连接统计信息。 -1 （MariaDB 10.0.12的默认值）用于自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows inserted at a time during bulk inserts when the result-set is stored in a temporary table on executing a UDF.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在执行UDF时将结果集存储在临时表中时，在批量插入期间一次插入的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows inserted into InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：插入InnoDB表的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows inserted into system tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：插入系统表的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows inserted.
trans-unit.target: 描述：插入的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows per thread contained in the events_waits_history table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 描述：events_waits_history表中包含的每个线程的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows per thread in the events_stages_history table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 描述：events_stages_history表中每个线程的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows per thread in the events_statements_history table. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 描述：events_statements_history表中每个线程的行数。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows read from InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从InnoDB表读取的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows read from system tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从系统表读取的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows read.
trans-unit.target: 描述：读取的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows sorted.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已排序的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows stored in the hosts table. If set to zero, no connection statistics are kept for the hosts table. -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：存储在主机表中的行数。如果设置为零，将不为主机表保留连接统计信息。 -1 （MariaDB 10.0.12的默认值）用于自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows stored in the row log buffer. See Monitoring progress and temporal memory usage of Online DDL in InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明：存储在行日志缓冲区中的行数。请参阅在InnoDB中监视Online DDL的进度和临时内存使用情况。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows to be examined for a query to be considered expensive, that is, maximum number of rows a subquery may examine in order to be executed during optimization and used for constant optimization.
trans-unit.target: 描述：要查询的被视为昂贵的查询要检查的行数，即子查询可以检查的最大行数，以便在优化期间执行并用于常量优化。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows to insert at a time when copying during bulk inserts.
trans-unit.target: 描述：批量插入期间一次复制要插入的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows updated for system tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为系统表更新的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows updated in InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB表中更新的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows updated.
trans-unit.target: 描述：更新的行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of rows, per table, that can be queued when performing INSERT DELAYED statements. If the queue becomes full, clients attempting to perform INSERT DELAYED's will wait until the queue has room available again.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个表在执行INSERT DELAYED语句时可以排队的行数。如果队列已满，则尝试执行INSERT DELAYED的客户端将等待，直到队列再次有可用空间为止。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of second read records on the backend server when the first records are found from the first read. Spider continues scanning a range, adding a LIMIT using the spider_first_read and spider_second_read variables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从第一次读取中找到第一条记录时，后端服务器上第二条读取记录的数量。Spider会继续扫描范围，并使用 spider_first_read 和 spider_second_read 变量添加一个 LIMIT 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Number of second read records on the backend server when using background search. When the first records are found from spider_bgs_first_read, the engine continues scanning a range adding a LIMIT of spider_bgs_first_read and spider_bgs_second_read.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用后台搜索时后端服务器上的第二次读取记录数。当从 spider_bgs_first_read 中找到第一条记录时，引擎将继续扫描范围，添加一个 LIMIT 的 spider_bgs_first_read 和 spider_bgs_second_read 。
